trans-unit.source: The LOAD INDEX INTO CACHE statement preloads a table index into the key cache to which it has been assigned by an explicit CACHE INDEX statement, or into the default key cache otherwise. LOAD INDEX INTO CACHE is used only for MyISAM or Aria tables. Until MariaDB 5.3, it was not supported for tables having user-defined partitioning, but this limitation was removed in MariaDB 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOAD INDEX INTO CACHE 的语句预加载表索引键缓存到它已经被明确指定的 CACHE INDEX 的语句，或者到默认键高速缓冲，否则。 LOAD INDEX INTO CACHE 仅用于MyISAM或Aria表。在MariaDB 5.3之前，具有用户定义的分区的表不支持该功能，但是在MariaDB 5.5中已删除了此限制。

trans-unit.source: The LOCALES plugin creates the LOCALES table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. The plugin also adds the SHOW LOCALES statement.The table and statement can be queried to see all locales that are compiled into the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOCALES 插件创建 LOCALES 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该插件还添加了 SHOW LOCALES 语句。可以查询该表和语句以查看编译到服务器中的所有语言环境。

trans-unit.source: The LOCALES plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.0.4.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOCALES 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.0.4。

trans-unit.source: The LOCALES table was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.4
trans-unit.target: 该 LOCALES 表是在引进MariaDB的10.0.4

trans-unit.source: The LOCK TABLES statement will not start a crash-safe segment. You should use BEGIN and COMMIT instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOCK TABLES 语句不会开始一个碰撞安全段。您应该改为使用 BEGIN 和 COMMIT 。

trans-unit.source: The LOW_PRIORITY and CONCURRENT keywords are mutually exclusive. They cannot be used in the same statement.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOW_PRIORITY 和 CONCURRENT 的关键字是互斥的。不能在同一语句中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The LooseScan strategy doesn't really need ordering, what it needs is grouping. In the above figure, satellites are grouped by country. For instance, all satellites owned by Australia come together, without being mixed with satellites of other countries. This makes it easy to select just one satellite from each group, which you can join with its country and get a list of countries without duplicates:
trans-unit.target: 该 LooseScan 策略并不真正需要订货，它需要的是分组。在上图中，卫星按国家分组。例如，澳大利亚拥有的所有卫星都汇聚在一起，而不会与其他国家的卫星混在一起。这样一来，您就可以轻松地从每个组中选择一颗卫星，您可以将其加入其国家/地区并获得没有重复的国家/地区列表：

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_BIND option for CHANGE MASTER can be used on replication slaves that have multiple network interfaces to choose which network interface the slave will use to connect to the master.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_BIND 选项可用于具有多个网络接口的复制从属服务器，以选择该从属服务器将使用哪个网络接口连接到主服务器。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_BIND option for CHANGE MASTER is only supported by MySQL 5.6.2 and later and by MySQL NDB Cluster 7.3.1 and later. This option is not yet supported by MariaDB. See MDEV-19248 for more information.
trans-unit.target: MySQL 5.6.2和更高版本以及MySQL NDB Cluster 7.3.1和更高版本仅支持 CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_BIND 选项。MariaDB尚不支持此选项。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19248。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_CONNECT_RETRY option for CHANGE MASTER defines how many seconds that the slave will wait between connection retries. The default is 60.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_CONNECT_RETRY 选项定义从属将在两次连接重试之间等待的秒数。默认值为 60 。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_DELAY option for CHANGE MASTER can be used to enable delayed replication. This option specifies the time in seconds (at least) that a replication slave should lag behind the master. Before executing an event, the slave will first wait, if necessary, until the given time has passed since the event was created on the master. The result is that the slave will reflect the state of the master some time back in the past. The default is zero, no delay.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_DELAY 选项可用于启用延迟复制。此选项指定复制从属服务器应落后于主服务器的时间（至少以秒为单位）。在执行事件之前，如有必要，从站将首先等待，直到在主站上创建事件以来已经过给定时间。结果是从站将在过去的某个时间反映主站的状态。默认值为零，无延迟。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_DELAY option for CHANGE MASTER was first added in MariaDB 10.2.3 to enable delayed replication.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.2.3中首先添加了 CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_DELAY 选项，以启用延迟复制。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_HEARTBEAT_PERIOD option for CHANGE MASTER can be used to set the interval in seconds between replication heartbeats. Whenever the master's binary log is updated with an event, the waiting period for the next heartbeat is reset.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_HEARTBEAT_PERIOD 选项可用于设置复制心跳之间的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。每当主站的二进制日志更新为一个事件时，下一个心跳的等待时间就会重置。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_HOST option for CHANGE MASTER defines the hostname or IP address of the replication master.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_HOST 选项定义复制主机的主机名或IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_LOG_FILE option for CHANGE MASTER can be used along with MASTER_LOG_POS to specify the coordinates at which the slave's I/O thread should begin reading from the master's binary logs the next time the thread starts.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_LOG_FILE 选项可与 MASTER_LOG_POS 一起使用，以指定从属设备的I / O线程在下次线程启动时应开始从主设备的二进制日志读取的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_LOG_FILE value of the START SLAVE UNTIL condition.
trans-unit.target: START SLAVE UNTIL 条件的 MASTER_LOG_FILE 值。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_LOG_POS option for CHANGE MASTER can be used along with MASTER_LOG_FILE to specify the coordinates at which the slave's I/O thread should begin reading from the master's binary logs the next time the thread starts.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_LOG_POS 选项与 MASTER_LOG_FILE 一起使用，以指定下一次线程启动时，从站的I / O线程应开始从主站的二进制日志读取的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_LOG_POS value of the START SLAVE UNTIL condition.
trans-unit.target: START SLAVE UNTIL 条件的 MASTER_LOG_POS 值。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_PORT option for CHANGE MASTER defines the TCP/IP port of the replication master.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_PORT 选项定义复制主机的TCP / IP端口。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL option for CHANGE MASTER tells the slave whether to force TLS for the connection. The valid values are 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL 选项告诉从服务器是否为连接强制TLS。有效值为 0 或 1 。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CA option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to a PEM file that should contain one or more X509 certificates for trusted Certificate Authorities (CAs) to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path. This option implies the MASTER_SSL option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CA 选项定义PEM文件的路径，该文件应包含一个或多个X509证书，以供TLS使用的受信任证书颁发机构（CA）。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。此选项暗含 MASTER_SSL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CA option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CA 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CAPATH option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to a directory that contains one or more PEM files that should each contain one X509 certificate for a trusted Certificate Authority (CA) to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path. The directory specified by this option needs to be run through the openssl rehash command. This option implies the MASTER_SSL option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CAPATH 选项定义了一个目录的路径，该目录包含一个或多个PEM文件，每个文件应包含一个X509证书，供受信任的证书颁发机构（CA）用于TLS。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。此选项指定的目录需要通过 openssl rehash 命令运行。此选项暗含 MASTER_SSL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CAPATH option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CAPATH 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CERT option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to the X509 certificate file to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path. This option implies the MASTER_SSL option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CERT 选项定义X509证书文件的路径以用于TLS。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。此选项暗含 MASTER_SSL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CERT option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CERT 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CIPHER option for CHANGE MASTER defines the list of permitted ciphers or cipher suites to use for TLS. Besides cipher names, if MariaDB was compiled with OpenSSL, this option could be set to "SSLv3" or "TLSv1.2" to allow all SSLv3 or all TLSv1.2 ciphers. Note that the TLSv1.3 ciphers cannot be excluded when using OpenSSL, even by using this option. See Using TLSv1.3 for details. This option implies the MASTER_SSL option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CIPHER 选项定义用于TLS的允许密码或密码套件的列表。除了密码名称之外，如果MariaDB是使用OpenSSL编译的，则可以将此选项设置为“ SSLv3”或“ TLSv1.2”，以允许所有SSLv3或所有TLSv1.2密码。请注意，即使使用此选项，使用OpenSSL时也不能排除TLSv1.3密码。有关详细信息，请参见使用TLSv1.3。此选项暗含 MASTER_SSL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CIPHER option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CIPHER 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CRL option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to a PEM file that should contain one or more revoked X509 certificates to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CRL 选项定义了一个PEM文件的路径，该文件应包含一个或多个撤销的X509证书以用于TLS。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CRL option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CRL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CRLPATH option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to a directory that contains one or more PEM files that should each contain one revoked X509 certificate to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path. The directory specified by this variable needs to be run through the openssl rehash command.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_CRLPATH 选项定义了一个目录的路径，该目录包含一个或多个PEM文件，每个文件应包含一个已撤销的X509证书以用于TLS。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。该变量指定的目录需要通过 openssl rehash 命令运行。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_CRLPATH option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_CRLPATH 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_KEY option for CHANGE MASTER defines a path to a private key file to use for TLS. This option requires that you use the absolute path, not a relative path. This option implies the MASTER_SSL option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_KEY 选项定义用于TLS的私钥文件的路径。此选项要求您使用绝对路径，而不是相对路径。此选项暗含 MASTER_SSL 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_KEY option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_KEY 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT option for CHANGE MASTER enables server certificate verification. This option is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT 选项启用服务器证书验证。默认情况下禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT option of the CHANGE MASTER TO statement.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER TO 语句的 MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT 选项。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_USER option for CHANGE MASTER defines the password that the replication slave will use to connect to the replication master as the user account defined by the MASTER_USER option.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_USER 选项定义复制从属将用来作为 MASTER_USER 选项定义的用户帐户连接到复制主的密码。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_USER option for CHANGE MASTER defines the user account that the replication slave will use to connect to the replication master.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_USER 选项定义复制从属服务器将用来连接复制主服务器的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_USE_GTID option for CHANGE MASTER can be used to configure the slave to use the global transaction ID (GTID) when connecting to a master. The possible values are:
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项可用于配置从属服务器在连接到主服务器时使用全局事务ID（GTID）。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The MASTER_USE_GTID option for CHANGE MASTER was first added in MariaDB 10.0.2 to enable replication with Global Transaction IDs (GTIDs).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.2中首先添加了 CHANGE MASTER 的 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项，以启用具有全局事务ID（GTID）的复制。

trans-unit.source: The MAX_DIST and DISTRIB column options are used for block indexing.
trans-unit.target: 的 MAX_DIST 和 DISTRIB 列选项用于块索引。

trans-unit.source: The MAX_ROWS table option provides a hint about the number of rows you plan to store in them. This is not a hard limit that cannot be exceeded, and does not allow to exceed max_heap_table_size. The storage engine uses max_heap_table_size and MAX_ROWS to calculate the maximum memory that could be allocated for the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 MAX_ROWS 表选项提供了一个关于你打算在其中存储的行数的提示。这不是一个不能超过的硬限制，并且不允许超过 max_heap_table_size 。存储引擎使用max_heap_table_size和MAX_ROWS来计算可以为表分配的最大内存。

trans-unit.source: The METADATA_LOCK_INFO plugin creates the METADATA_LOCK_INFO table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. This table shows active metadata locks. The table will be empty if there are no active metadata locks.
trans-unit.target: 该 METADATA_LOCK_INFO 插件创建 METADATA_LOCK_INFO 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该表显示了活动的元数据锁。如果没有活动的元数据锁，则该表将为空。

trans-unit.source: The METADATA_LOCK_INFO plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.0.7.
trans-unit.target: 该 METADATA_LOCK_INFO 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.0.7。

trans-unit.source: The NONE locking strategy performs the operation without acquiring any lock on the table. This permits all concurrent DML.
trans-unit.target: 该 NONE 锁定策略不获取表上的所有锁进行操作。这允许所有并发DML。

trans-unit.source: The NTH_VALUE function returns the value evaluated at row number num_row of the window frame, starting from 1, or NULL if the row does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NTH_VALUE 函数返回在行号计算的值 num_row 窗框，从1开始，或NULL，如果行不存在。

trans-unit.source: The ON COMPLETION clause can be used to specify if the event must be deleted after its last execution (that is, after its AT or ENDS timestamp is past). By default, events are dropped when they are expired. To explicitly state that this is the desired behaviour, you can use ON COMPLETION NOT PRESERVE. Instead, if you want the event to be preserved, you can use ON COMPLETION PRESERVE.
trans-unit.target: 本 ON COMPLETION 子句可用于指定事件必须在其最后一次执行后，可以删除（即，它的后 AT 或 ENDS 时间戳是过去）。默认情况下，事件过期时将删除它们。要明确声明这是期望的行为，可以使用 ON COMPLETION NOT PRESERVE 。相反，如果希望保留事件，则可以使用 ON COMPLETION PRESERVE 。

trans-unit.source: The ON COMPLETION clause, either PRESERVE or NOT PRESERVE .
trans-unit.target: 本 ON COMPLETION 条款，要么 PRESERVE 或 NOT PRESERVE 。

trans-unit.source: The ON SCHEDULE clause can be used to specify when the event must be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 该 ON SCHEDULE 子句可用于指定当事件必须被触发。

trans-unit.source: The OPTIMIZE TABLE statement has no effect, because the innodb_optimize_fulltext_only variable wasn't set:
trans-unit.target: 该 OPTIMIZE TABLE 语句没有影响，因为innodb_optimize_fulltext_only变量未设置：

trans-unit.source: The OR REPLACE and IF NOT EXISTS clauses:
trans-unit.target: 该 OR REPLACE 和 IF NOT EXISTS 子句：

trans-unit.source: The OR REPLACE clause was added in MariaDB 10.0.8.
trans-unit.target: 该 OR REPLACE 子句中添加MariaDB的10.0.8。

trans-unit.source: The OR REPLACE clause was added in MariaDB 10.1.3
trans-unit.target: 该 OR REPLACE 子句中添加MariaDB的10.1.3

trans-unit.source: The OR REPLACE clause was added in MariaDB 10.1.4.
trans-unit.target: 该 OR REPLACE 子句中添加MariaDB的10.1.4。

trans-unit.source: The OR REPLACE clause was included in MariaDB 10.1.4. If used and the event already exists, instead of an error being returned, the existing event will be dropped and replaced by the newly defined event.
trans-unit.target: 该 OR REPLACE 条款被列入MariaDB的10.1.4。如果使用且事件已存在，则将删除现有事件并将其替换为新定义的事件，而不是返回错误。

trans-unit.source: The PREPARE statement prepares a statement and assigns it a name, stmt_name, by which to refer to the statement later. Statement names are not case sensitive. preparable_stmt is either a string literal or a user variable (not a local variable, an SQL expression or a subquery) that contains the text of the statement. The text must represent a single SQL statement, not multiple statements. Within the statement, "?" characters can be used as parameter markers to indicate where data values are to be bound to the query later when you execute it. The "?" characters should not be enclosed within quotes, even if you intend to bind them to string values. Parameter markers can be used only where data values should appear, not for SQL keywords, identifiers, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 该 PREPARE 语句准备的一份声明，并赋予它一个名称， stmt_name ，通过引用的声明之后。语句名称不区分大小写。 preparable_stmt 是字符串文字或用户变量（不是局部变量），SQL表达式或子查询），其中包含语句的文本。文本必须表示单个SQL语句，而不是多个语句。在语句中，“？” 字符可以用作参数标记，以指示稍后在执行查询时将数据值绑定到查询的位置。“？” 即使您打算将字符绑定到字符串值，也不应将字符括在引号中。参数标记只能用于应显示数据值的地方，而不能用于SQL关键字，标识符等。

trans-unit.source: The PROCEDURE clause of SELECT passes the whole result set to a Procedure which will process it. These Procedures are not Stored Procedures, and can only be written in the C language, so it is necessary to recompile the server.
trans-unit.target: SELECT的 PROCEDURE 子句将整个结果集传递给将对其进行处理的过程。这些过程不是存储过程，只能以C语言编写，因此有必要重新编译服务器。

trans-unit.source: The PROCESSprivilege is required to view the table.
trans-unit.target: 必须具有 PROCESS 特权才能查看表。

trans-unit.source: The PROCESSLIST.ID value for threads displayed in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST table, or 0 for background threads. Also corresponds with the CONNECTION_ID() return value for the thread.
trans-unit.target: 在 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST 表中显示的线程的 PROCESSLIST.ID 值，对于后台线程为 0 。还与线程的 CONNECTION_ID() 返回值相对应。

trans-unit.source: The PROXY privilege allows one user to proxy as another user, which means their privileges change to that of the proxy user, and the CURRENT_USER() function returns the user name of the proxy user.
trans-unit.target: 该 PROXY 权限允许一个用户代理作为另一个用户，这意味着它们的权限更改为代理用户的，和 CURRENT_USER() 函数返回的代理用户的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The PROXY privilege only works with authentication plugins that support it. The default mysql_native_password authentication plugin does not support proxy users.
trans-unit.target: 该 PROXY 特权只适用于支持它的身份验证插件。默认的 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件不支持代理用户。

trans-unit.source: The PURGE BINARY LOGS statement deletes all the binary log files listed in the log index file prior to the specified log file name or date. BINARY and MASTER are synonyms. Deleted log files also are removed from the list recorded in the index file, so that the given log file becomes the first in the list.
trans-unit.target: 该 PURGE BINARY LOGS 语句删除所有二进制日志在日志索引文件中指定的日志文件名或日期之前列出的文件。 BINARY 和 MASTER 是同义词。删除的日志文件也将从记录在索引文件中的列表中删除，以便给定的日志文件成为列表中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin creates the QUERY_CACHE_INFO table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. This table shows all queries in the query cache. Querying this table acquires the query cache lock and will result in lock waits for queries that are using or expiring from the query cache. You must have the PROCESS privilege to query this table.
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件创建 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该表显示了查询缓存中的所有查询。查询此表将获取查询缓存锁，并将导致锁等待正在使用或从查询缓存中过期的查询。您必须具有 PROCESS 特权才能查询该表。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin was first released in MariaDB 5.5.31.
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件首先在发布MariaDB的31年5月5日。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_INFO table is created by the QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin, and allows you to see the contents of the query cache. It creates a table in the information_schema database that shows all queries that are in the cache. You must have the PROCESS privilege (see GRANT) to use this table.
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 表由创建 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件，并允许您看到的内容查询缓存。它在 information_schema 数据库中创建一个表，该表显示高速缓存中的所有查询。您必须具有 PROCESS 特权（请参阅GRANT）才能使用此表。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_INFO table was introduced as part of the QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin in MariaDB 5.5.31.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5.31中， QUERY_CACHE_INFO 表是 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_INFO table will be removed in a future release, and replaced by the QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES table (see MDEV-4682).
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 表将在以后的版本中删除，并替换 QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES 表（见MDEV-4682）。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES table will be introduced as part of a future change to the QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin, and allows you to see the contents of the query cache. It replaces the QUERY_CACHE_INFO table.
trans-unit.target: 在将来对 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件进行更改时，将引入 QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES 表，并允许您查看查询缓存的内容。它替换了 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 表。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES table will be introduced in a future version of MariaDB. See MDEV-4682
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES 表将在MariaDB的未来版本的推出。参见MDEV-4682

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES_TABLES table will be introduced as part of a future change to the QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin, and shows all tables used in a query cache entry.
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES_TABLES 表将被引入为未来变化的一部分 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件，并显示在使用中的所有表的查询缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES_TABLES table will be introduced in a future version of MariaDB. See MDEV-4682
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_QUERIES_TABLES 表将在MariaDB的未来版本的推出。参见MDEV-4682

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_TABLES table will be introduced as part of a future change to the QUERY_CACHE_INFO plugin, and shows all tables inside the query cache and how many queries have been cached for each.
trans-unit.target: 在将来对 QUERY_CACHE_INFO 插件进行更改时，将引入 QUERY_CACHE_TABLES 表，该表将显示查询高速缓存内的所有表以及已为每个高速缓存存储了多少查询。

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_CACHE_TABLES table will be introduced in a future version of MariaDB. See MDEV-4682
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_CACHE_TABLES 表将在MariaDB的未来版本的推出。参见MDEV-4682

trans-unit.source: The QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME table was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.4
trans-unit.target: 该 QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME 表是在引进MariaDB的10.0.4

trans-unit.source: The REDUNDANT row format is supported by both the Antelope and the Barracudafile formats, so tables with this row format can be created regardless of the value of the innodb_file_format system variable.
trans-unit.target: 的 REDUNDANT 行格式由两个支撑 Antelope 和 Barracuda 的文件格式，所以使用此行格式的表可以不考虑的值的创建 innodb_file_format 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: The REDUNDANT row format is the original non-compacted row format.
trans-unit.target: 该 REDUNDANT 行格式是原来的非压缩行格式。

trans-unit.source: The REDUNDANT row format supports index prefixes up to 767 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该 REDUNDANT 行格式支持指数的前缀多达767个字节。

trans-unit.source: The REDUNDANT row format was the only available row format before MySQL 5.0.3. In that release, this row format was retroactively named the REDUNDANT row format. In the same release, the COMPACT row format was introduced as the new default row format.
trans-unit.target: 该 REDUNDANT 行格式是MySQL的5.0.3之前唯一可用的行格式。在该发行版中，该行格式被追溯命名为 REDUNDANT 行格式。在同一发行版中， COMPACT 行格式被引入为新的默认行格式。

trans-unit.source: The RELAY_LOG_FILE option for CHANGE MASTER can be used along with the RELAY_LOG_POS option to specify the coordinates at which the slave's SQL thread should begin reading from the relay log the next time the thread starts.
trans-unit.target: 该 RELAY_LOG_FILE 的选项 CHANGE MASTER 可以与一起使用 RELAY_LOG_POS 选项来指定在该坐标奴隶的SQL线程应该开始从读取中继日志在下次线程启动。

trans-unit.source: The RELAY_LOG_POS option for CHANGE MASTER can be used along with the RELAY_LOG_FILE option to specify the coordinates at which the slave's SQL thread should begin reading from the relay log the next time the thread starts.
trans-unit.target: 该 RELAY_LOG_POS 的选项 CHANGE MASTER 可以与一起使用 RELAY_LOG_FILE 选项来指定在该坐标奴隶的SQL线程应该开始从读取中继日志在下次线程启动。

trans-unit.source: The REPAIR VIEW statement was introduced to assist with fixing MDEV-6916, an issue introduced in MariaDB 5.2 where the view algorithms were swapped compared to their MySQL on disk representation. It checks whether the view algorithm is correct. It is run as part of mysql_upgrade, and should not normally be required in regular use.
trans-unit.target: 该 REPAIR VIEW 语句被引入，以协助固定MDEV-6916，在引入了一个问题，MariaDB的5.2，其视图算法进行了交换相比，他们在磁盘上表示MySQL的。它检查视图算法是否正确。它作为mysql_upgrade的一部分运行，通常不应常规使用。

trans-unit.source: The REPLACE keyword works like the REPLACE statement. Here, the statement attempts to load the data from the file. If the row does not exist, it adds it to the table. If the row contains an existing Primary Key, it replaces the table data. That is, in the event of a conflict, it assumes the file contains the desired row.
trans-unit.target: 在 REPLACE 关键字作品就像 REPLACE 语句。在这里，该语句尝试从文件中加载数据。如果该行不存在，则将其添加到表中。如果该行包含现有的主键，它将替换表数据。也就是说，如果发生冲突，它将假定文件包含所需的行。

trans-unit.source: The REQUIRE keyword must be used only once for all specified options, and the AND keyword can be used to separate individual options, but it is not required.
trans-unit.target: 所有指定的选项必须仅将 REQUIRE 关键字使用一次，并且 AND 关键字可以用于分隔各个选项，但是不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The RESET statement is similar to FLUSH. See RESET.
trans-unit.target: 该 RESET 语句类似于 FLUSH 。请参阅RESET。

trans-unit.source: The RESET statement is used to clear the state of various server operations. You must have the RELOAD privilege to execute RESET.
trans-unit.target: 该 RESET 语句被用于清除不同的服务器操作的状态。您必须具有 RELOAD privilege 才能执行 RESET 。

trans-unit.source: The RETURN statement terminates execution of a stored function and returns the value expr to the function caller. There must be at least one RETURN statement in a stored function. If the function has multiple exit points, all exit points must have a RETURN.
trans-unit.target: 在 RETURN 语句终止执行存储功能和返回值 expr 的函数调用。存储的函数中必须至少有一个 RETURN 语句。如果函数具有多个出口点，则所有出口点都必须具有 RETURN 。

trans-unit.source: The RETURNS clause indicates the type of the function's return value, and can be one of STRING, INTEGER, REAL or DECIMAL. DECIMAL functions currently return string values and should be written like STRING functions.
trans-unit.target: 在 RETURNS 子句表示函数的返回值的类型，并且可以是一个STRING，INTEGER，REAL或DECIMAL。 DECIMAL 函数当前返回字符串值，应像STRING函数一样编写。

trans-unit.source: The RETURNS clause specifies the return type of the function. NULL values are permitted with all return types.
trans-unit.target: 在 RETURNS 子句指定函数的返回类型。所有返回类型都允许使用 NULL 值。

trans-unit.source: The REVOKE statement enables system administrators to revoke privileges (or roles - see section below) from MariaDB accounts. Each account is named using the same format as for the GRANT statement; for example, 'jeffrey'@'localhost'. If you specify only the user name part of the account name, a host name part of '%' is used. For details on the levels at which privileges exist, the allowable priv_type and priv_level values, and the syntax for specifying users and passwords, see GRANT.
trans-unit.target: 在 REVOKE 语句，系统管理员可以撤销权限（或角色-见下面的部分）从MariaDB的帐户。每个帐户的命名格式均与 GRANT 语句相同。例如，“ jeffrey'@'localhost ”。如果仅指定帐户名的用户名部分，则使用主机名部分' % '。有关特权级别，允许的 priv_type 和 priv_level 值以及用于指定用户和密码的语法的详细信息，请参见 GRANT 。

trans-unit.source: The ROLLBACK statement rolls back (ends) a transaction, destroying any changes to SQL-data so that they never become visible to subsequent transactions. The required syntax for the ROLLBACK statement is as follows.
trans-unit.target: 该 ROLLBACK 语句回滚（结束）事务，破坏到SQL数据的任何变化，使他们永远不会成为可见的后续事务。 ROLLBACK 语句所需的语法如下。

trans-unit.source: The ROLLBACK statement will either end a transaction, destroying all data changes that happened during any of the transaction, or it will just destroy any data changes that happened since you established a savepoint. The basic form of the ROLLBACK statement is just the keyword ROLLBACK (the keyword WORK is simply noise and can be omitted without changing the effect).
trans-unit.target: 该 ROLLBACK 语句要么结束事务，破坏在任何交易中所发生的所有数据更改，否则会破坏只是因为你建立一个保存点所发生的任何数据更改。 ROLLBACK 语句的基本形式只是关键字 ROLLBACK （关键字 WORK 只是噪音，可以在不改变效果的情况下将其省略）。

trans-unit.source: The ROW data type was introduced in MariaDB 10.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 ROW 数据类型是在引进MariaDB的10.3.0。

trans-unit.source: The ROW_FORMAT table option specifies the row format for the data file. Possible values are engine-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 该 ROW_FORMAT 表选项指定数据文件中的行格式。可能的值取决于引擎。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT MAX_STATEMENT_TIME = N ... syntax is not valid in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT MAX_STATEMENT_TIME = N ... 语法是不是在MariaDB的有效。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT is DERIVED from the PRIMARY.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 是 DERIVED 自 PRIMARY 。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT is a PRIMARY one.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 是一个 PRIMARY 一个。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT is a SIMPLE one.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 是一个 SIMPLE 的选择。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT is a SUBQUERY of the PRIMARY.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 是 SUBQUERY 中的 PRIMARY 。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT is a UNION of the PRIMARY.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 是一个 UNION 中的 PRIMARY 。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement is used for retrieving data from tables, for select specific data, often based on a criteria given in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 语句用于从表中检索数据，选择特定的数据，往往是根据在给定的一个标准 WHERE 子句。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT was a sub query that did not use any tables. For example a there was no FROM clause or a FROM DUAL clause.
trans-unit.target: 该 SELECT 是，没有使用任何表格的子查询。例如，没有 FROM 子句或 FROM DUAL 子句。

trans-unit.source: The SET DEBUG_SYNC statement adds a requested action to the array or overwrites an existing action for the same sync point. When it adds a new action, the array is sorted again.
trans-unit.target: 该 SET DEBUG_SYNC 语句添加请求的操作到阵列或将覆盖相同的同步点现有的操作。当添加新动作时，该数组将再次排序。

trans-unit.source: The SET DEFAULT ROLE statement sets a default role for a specified (or current) user. A default role is automatically enabled when a user connects (an implicit SET ROLE statement is executed immediately after a connection is established).
trans-unit.target: 该 SET DEFAULT ROLE 语句设置一个默认的角色为指定的（或电流）的用户。用户连接时会自动启用默认角色（建立连接后立即执行隐式 SET ROLE 语句）。

trans-unit.source: The SET DEFAULT action is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 该 SET DEFAULT 是不支持的行动。

trans-unit.source: The SET OPTION syntax is deprecated in MariaDB 10.0. Use SET instead.
trans-unit.target: 在 SET OPTION 语法在弃用MariaDB的10.0。请改用 SET 。

trans-unit.source: The SET PASSWORD statement assigns a password to an existing MariaDB user account.
trans-unit.target: 该 SET PASSWORD 语句中指定密码到现有MariaDB的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The SET ROLE statement enables a role, along with all of its associated permissions, for the current session. To unset a role, use NONE .
trans-unit.target: 在 SET ROLE 语句使一个角色，所有与其相关的权限一起，针对当前会话。要取消设置角色，请使用 NONE 。

trans-unit.source: The SET statement assigns values to different types of variables that affect the operation of the server or your client. Older versions of MySQL employed SET OPTION, but this syntax was deprecated in favor of SET without OPTION, and was removed in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 SET 语句将值分配给不同类型的影响服务器或客户端的操作变量。MySQL的旧版本使用 SET OPTION ，但这个语法是有利于弃用 SET 没有 OPTION ，并在除去MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The SET statement in stored programs is an extended version of the general SET statement. Referenced variables may be ones declared inside a stored program, global system variables, or user-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 SET 在声明中存储的程序是一般的扩展版本 SET 语句。引用变量可以是在存储程序中声明的变量，全局系统变量或用户定义的变量。

trans-unit.source: The SET statement in stored programs is implemented as part of the pre-existing SET syntax. This allows an extended syntax of SET a=x, b=y, ... where different variable types (locally declared variables, global and session server variables, user-defined variables) can be mixed. This also allows combinations of local variables and some options that make sense only for system variables; in that case, the options are recognized but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 存储程序中的 SET 语句是作为预先存在的SET语法的一部分实现的。这允许使用 SET a=x, b=y, ... 的扩展语法，其中可以混合使用不同的变量类型（本地声明的变量，全局和会话服务器变量，用户定义的变量）。这也允许组合局部变量和一些仅对系统变量有意义的选项。在这种情况下，可以识别但忽略选项。

trans-unit.source: The SHARED locking strategy performs the operation after acquiring a read lock on the table. This permit read-only concurrent DML.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHARED 获取表上的读取锁定之后的操作锁定策略执行。这允许只读并发DML。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW AUTHORS statement displays information about the people who work on MariaDB. For each author, it displays Name, Location, and Comment values. All columns are encoded as latin1.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW AUTHORS 是谁在MariaDB的工作的人语句显示的信息。对于每个作者，它将显示“名称”，“位置”和“注释”值。所有列均编码为latin1。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW CHARACTER SET statement shows all available character sets. The LIKE clause, if present on its own, indicates which character set names to match. The WHERE and LIKE clauses can be given to select rows using more general conditions, as discussed in Extended SHOW.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW CHARACTER SET 语句显示所有可用的字符集。在 LIKE 子句中，如果存在自身，表示要匹配的字符集的名称。可以使用 WHERE 和 LIKE 子句来使用更一般的条件选择行，如Extended SHOW中所述。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW CLIENT_STATISTICS statement was introduced in MariaDB 5.2 as part of the User Statistics feature. It was removed as a separate statement in MariaDB 10.1.1, but effectively replaced by the generic SHOW information_schema_table statement. The information_schema.CLIENT_STATISTICS table holds statistics about client connections.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW CLIENT_STATISTICS 声明中介绍MariaDB的5.2作为一部分用户统计功能。它已在MariaDB 10.1.1中作为单独的语句删除，但实际上已由通用的 SHOW information_schema_table 语句代替。该 information_schema.CLIENT_STATISTICS 表保存有关客户端连接的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW CONTRIBUTORS statement displays information about the companies and people who financially contribute to MariaDB. For each contributor, it displays Name, Location, and Comment values. All columns are encoded as latin1.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW CONTRIBUTORS 对企业和人民谁提供财政捐助MariaDB的语句显示的信息。对于每个贡献者，它显示 Name ， Location 和 Comment 值。所有列均编码为 latin1 。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW COUNT(*) ERRORS statement displays the number of errors. You can also retrieve this number from the error_count variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW COUNT(*) ERRORS 语句显示错误的数目。您也可以从error_count变量中检索此数字。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW COUNT(*) WARNINGS statement displays the total number of errors, warnings, and notes. You can also retrieve this number from the warning_count variable:
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW COUNT(*) WARNINGS 语句显示错误，警告和注意事项的总数。您还可以从warning_count变量中检索此数字：

trans-unit.source: The SHOW CREATE PACKAGE BODY statement can be used when Oracle SQL_MODE is set.
trans-unit.target: 在 SHOW CREATE PACKAGE BODY 语句时，可以使用甲骨文SQL_MODE设置。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW CREATE PACKAGE statement can be used when Oracle SQL_MODE is set.
trans-unit.target: 在 SHOW CREATE PACKAGE 语句时，可以使用甲骨文SQL_MODE设置。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW EXPLAIN command allows one to get an EXPLAIN (that is, a description of a query plan) of a query running in a certain thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SHOW EXPLAIN 命令可以获取在特定线程中运行的查询的 EXPLAIN （即查询计划的描述）。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW EXPLAIN command is a new feature in MariaDB 10.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW EXPLAIN 命令是在一个新的功能，MariaDB的10.0.0。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS statement was introduced in MariaDB 5.2 as part of the User Statistics feature. It was removed as a separate statement in MariaDB 10.1.1, but effectively replaced by the generic SHOW information_schema_table statement. The information_schmea.INDEX_STATISTICS table shows statistics on index usage and makes it possible to do such things as locating unused indexes and generating the commands to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS 声明中介绍MariaDB的5.2作为一部分用户统计功能。它已在MariaDB 10.1.1中作为单独的语句删除，但实际上已由通用的 SHOW information_schema_table 语句代替。该 information_schmea.INDEX_STATISTICS 对指数使用，使表显示的统计信息有可能做这样的事情定位未使用的索引和生成的命令将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW PACKAGE BODY STATUS statement returns characteristics of stored package bodies (implementations), such as the database, name, type, creator, creation and modification dates, and character set information. A similar statement, SHOW PACKAGE STATUS, displays information about stored package specifications.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW PACKAGE BODY STATUS 存储包体（实现），诸如数据库，名称，类型，创建者，创建和修改日期，和字符集信息的语句返回特性。类似的语句 SHOW PACKAGE STATUS 显示有关存储的包装规格的信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW PACKAGE STATUS statement returns characteristics of stored package specifications, such as the database, name, type, creator, creation and modification dates, and character set information. A similar statement, SHOW PACKAGE BODY STATUS, displays information about stored package bodies (i.e. implementations).
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW PACKAGE STATUS 存储包的规格，如数据库，名称，类型，创建者，创建和修改日期，和字符集信息的语句返回特性。类似的语句 SHOW PACKAGE BODY STATUS ，显示有关已存储的程序包主体（即，实现）的信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW PROFILE and SHOW PROFILES statements display profiling information that indicates resource usage for statements executed during the course of the current session.
trans-unit.target: 在 SHOW PROFILE ，并 SHOW PROFILES 报表显示剖析，表示当前会话过程中执行的语句资源使用信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW PROFILES statement displays profiling information that indicates resource usage for statements executed during the course of the current session. It is used together with SHOW PROFILE.
trans-unit.target: 在 SHOW PROFILES 声明显示概要，表示当前会话过程中执行的语句资源使用信息。它与 SHOW PROFILE 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS statement was introduced in MariaDB 5.2 as part of the User Statistics feature. It was removed as a separate statement in MariaDB 10.1.1, but effectively replaced by the generic SHOW information_schema_table statement. The information_schema.TABLE_STATISTICS table shows statistics on table usage
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS 声明中介绍MariaDB的5.2作为一部分用户统计功能。它已在MariaDB 10.1.1中作为单独的语句删除，但实际上已由通用的 SHOW information_schema_table 语句代替。该 information_schema.TABLE_STATISTICS 上表的使用情况表显示统计

trans-unit.source: The SHOW USER_STATISTICS statement was introduced in MariaDB 5.2 as part of the User Statistics feature. It was removed as a separate statement in MariaDB 10.1.1, but effectively replaced by the generic SHOW information_schema_table statement. The information_schema.USER_STATISTICS table holds statistics about user activity. You can use this table to find out such things as which user is causing the most load and which users are being abusive. You can also use this table to measure how close to capacity the server may be.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW USER_STATISTICS 声明中介绍MariaDB的5.2作为一部分用户统计功能。它已在MariaDB 10.1.1中作为单独的语句删除，但实际上已由通用的 SHOW information_schema_table 语句代替。该 information_schema.USER_STATISTICS 表保存有关用户活动的统计数据。您可以使用此表查找诸如哪些用户引起最大负载以及哪些用户正在滥用等情况。您还可以使用此表来衡量服务器可能接近的容量。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP statement returns Galera node cluster membership information. It returns the same information as found in the information_schema.WSREP_MEMBERSHIP table. Only users with the SUPER privilege can access this information.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 语句返回加莱拉节点群集成员信息。它返回与在 information_schema.WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 表中找到的信息相同的信息。只有具有 SUPER 特权的用户才能访问此信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW WSREP_STATUS statement returns Galera node and cluster status information. It returns the same information as found in the information_schema.WSREP_STATUS table. Only users with the SUPER privilege can access this information.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHOW WSREP_STATUS 语句返回加莱拉节点和集群状态信息。它返回与在 information_schema.WSREP_STATUS 表中找到的信息相同的信息。只有具有 SUPER 特权的用户才能访问此信息。

trans-unit.source: The SHUTDOWN command is a new feature in MariaDB 10.0.4
trans-unit.target: 该 SHUTDOWN 命令是在一个新的功能，MariaDB的10.0.4

trans-unit.source: The SHUTDOWN command shuts the server down.
trans-unit.target: 该 SHUTDOWN 命令关闭服务器关闭。

trans-unit.source: The SPATIAL_REF_SYS table was introduced in MariaDB 10.1.2
trans-unit.target: 该 SPATIAL_REF_SYS 表是在引进MariaDB的10.1.2

trans-unit.source: The SQL SECURITY clause specifies what privileges are used when a function is called. If SQL SECURITY is INVOKER, the function body will be evaluated using the privileges of the user calling the function. If SQL SECURITY is DEFINER, the function body is always evaluated using the privileges of the definer account. DEFINER is the default.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL SECURITY 当一个函数被调用使用子句指定什么特权。如果 SQL SECURITY 是 INVOKER ，则将使用调用函数的用户特权来评估函数主体。如果 SQL SECURITY 是 DEFINER ，则始终使用定义者帐户的特权来评估函数主体。 DEFINER 是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The SQL_ERROR_LOG plugin collects errors sent to clients in a log file defined by sql_error_log_filename, so that they can later be analyzed. The log file can be rotated if sql_error_log_rotate is set.
trans-unit.target: 该 SQL_ERROR_LOG 插件收集错误发送到客户端通过定义一个日志文件 sql_error_log_filename ，让他们可以在以后进行分析。如果设置了 sql_error_log_rotate ,则可以旋转日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The SQL_ERROR_LOG plugin was first released in MariaDB 5.5.22.
trans-unit.target: 该 SQL_ERROR_LOG 插件首先在发布MariaDB的5.5.22。

trans-unit.source: The START TRANSACTION or BEGIN statement begins a new transaction. COMMIT commits the current transaction, making its changes permanent. ROLLBACK rolls back the current transaction, canceling its changes. The SETautocommit statement disables or enables the default autocommit mode for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 在 START TRANSACTION 或 BEGIN 语句开始一个新的事务。COMMIT提交当前事务，使其更改永久生效。ROLLBACK回滚当前事务，取消其更改。该SET 自动提交声明禁用或启用当前会话的默认自动提交模式。

trans-unit.source: The START stage is designed for the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 在 START 阶段是专为以下任务：

trans-unit.source: The STORED keyword is not supported as an alias for the PERSISTENT keyword.
trans-unit.target: 不支持将 STORED 关键字用作 PERSISTENT 关键字的别名。

trans-unit.source: The STORED keyword is supported as an alias for the PERSISTENT keyword.
trans-unit.target: 支持将 STORED 关键字用作 PERSISTENT 关键字的别名。

trans-unit.source: The SUBQUERY is MATERIALIZED.
trans-unit.target: 子 SUBQUERY 已 MATERIALIZED 。

trans-unit.source: The SUBQUERY is DEPENDENT.
trans-unit.target: 该 SUBQUERY 是 DEPENDENT 。

trans-unit.source: The SUBQUERY is UNCACHEABLE.
trans-unit.target: 子 SUBQUERY 是 UNCACHEABLE 。

trans-unit.source: The SUPER privilege is also required if statement-based binary logging is used. See Binary Logging of Stored Routines for more details.
trans-unit.target: 该 SUPER 如果使用基于语句的二进制日志的权限也是必需的。有关更多详细信息，请参见存储例程的二进制日志记录。

trans-unit.source: The SUPERprivilege is required to view the table, and it also requires the innodb_ft_aux_table system variable to be set.
trans-unit.target: 的 SUPER 特权才能查看表，并且它也要求innodb_ft_aux_table要设定系统变量。

trans-unit.source: The SUPERprivilege is required to view the table, and it also requires the innodb_ft_aux_table system variable to be set.
trans-unit.target: 的 SUPER 特权才能查看表，并且它也要求innodb_ft_aux_table要设定系统变量。

trans-unit.source: The Spider Proxy Nodes are instances running at least MariaDB 10. Spider Proxy Nodes are used to declare per table attachment to the backend nodes. In addition Spider Proxy Nodes can be setup to enable the tables to be split and mirrored to multiple Backend Nodes.
trans-unit.target: 的 Spider Proxy Nodes 正在运行的实例至少MariaDB的10 Spider Proxy Nodes 用于声明每个表附着到后端节点。另外，可以设置 Spider Proxy Nodes 以使表能够拆分并镜像到多个 Backend Nodes 。

trans-unit.target: EXPLAIN 输出中显示了最后一张图的 Start temporary 和 End temporary ：

trans-unit.source: The System Windows Directory is the directory returned by the GetSystemWindowsDirectory function. The value is usually C:\Windows. To find its specific value on your system, open cmd.exe and execute:
trans-unit.target: 该 System Windows Directory 是由返回目录 GetSystemWindowsDirectory 功能。该值通常是 C:\Windows 。要在系统上找到其特定值，请打开 cmd.exe 并执行：

trans-unit.source: The TABLE_STATISTICS table was introduced in MariaDB 5.2.0 as part of the User Statistics feature.
trans-unit.target: 该 TABLE_STATISTICS 表是在引进MariaDB的5.2.0为部分用户统计功能。

trans-unit.source: The TABNAME option is mandatory here to specify what the queried table name is.
trans-unit.target: 该 TABNAME 选项是强制性这里指定查询的表名是什么。

trans-unit.source: The TEMP_TABLES_INFO table was introduced in MariaDB 10.2.2 and was removed in MariaDB 10.2.4. See MDEV-12459 progress on an alternative.
trans-unit.target: 该 TEMP_TABLES_INFO 表是在引进MariaDB的10.2.2和移除MariaDB的10.2.4。有关替代方案，请参见MDEV-12459的进度。

trans-unit.source: The TEXT types are
trans-unit.target: 该 TEXT 类型

trans-unit.source: The THREAD_ID of the locking thread if a thread has a mutex locked, otherwise NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程已锁定互斥锁，则锁定线程的 THREAD_ID ，否则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The TIMER_NAME value can be changed to choose a different timer, and can be any non-NULL value in the performance_timers.TIMER_NAME column.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TIMER_NAME 值可以改变，以选择一个不同的定时器，并且可以在任何非空值performance_timers.TIMER_NAME柱。

trans-unit.source: The TOTAL_SSL_CONNECTIONS and MAX_STATEMENT_TIME_EXCEEDED columns were added in MariaDB 10.1.1
trans-unit.target: 该 TOTAL_SSL_CONNECTIONS 和 MAX_STATEMENT_TIME_EXCEEDED 在加列MariaDB的10.1.1

trans-unit.source: The TYPE column provides a bit flag with information about the foreign key. This information is OR'ed together to read:
trans-unit.target: 该 TYPE 列提供一个位标志有关外键的信息。将该信息进行“ OR ” 运算以阅读：

trans-unit.source: The UNION is DEPENDENT.
trans-unit.target: 该 UNION 是 DEPENDENT 。

trans-unit.source: The UNION is UNCACHEABLE.
trans-unit.target: 该 UNION 是 UNCACHEABLE 。

trans-unit.source: The UNIQUE keyword means that the index will not accept duplicated values, except for NULLs. An error will raise if you try to insert duplicate values in a UNIQUE index.
trans-unit.target: 该 UNIQUE 关键字意味着该指数将不接受重复的值以外的NULL。如果您尝试在UNIQUE索引中插入重复值，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The UPDATE FOR PORTION statement has the following limitations:
trans-unit.target: 在 UPDATE FOR PORTION 语句具有以下限制：

trans-unit.source: The UPDATE statement supports the following modifiers:
trans-unit.target: 在 UPDATE 语句支持以下修饰符：

trans-unit.source: The UPDATE statement will first buffer the rows, and then run the updates, rather than do updates on the fly. See Using Buffer UPDATE Algorithm for a detailed explanation.
trans-unit.target: 该 UPDATE 语句将第一缓存行，然后运行更新，而不是做对飞的更新。有关详细说明，请参见使用缓冲区更新算法。

trans-unit.source: The USAGE Privilege
trans-unit.target: 该 USAGE 特权

trans-unit.source: The USAGE privilege grants no real privileges. The SHOW GRANTS statement will show a global USAGE privilege for a newly-created user. You can use USAGE with the GRANT statement to change options like GRANT OPTION and MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS without changing any account privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该 USAGE 特权授予没有真正的特权。在 SHOW GRANTS 账单会显示一个全球性的 USAGE 为新创建的用户权限。您可以将 USAGE 与 GRANT 语句一起使用，以更改 GRANT OPTION 和 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 之类的选项，而无需更改任何帐户特权。

trans-unit.source: The USER and HOST values shown here are the username and host used for user connections, not the patterns used to check permissions.
trans-unit.target: 此处显示的 USER 和 HOST 值是用于用户连接的用户名和主机，而不是用于检查权限的模式。

trans-unit.source: The USER_STATISTICS table was introduced in MariaDB 5.2.0 as part of the User Statistics feature.
trans-unit.target: 该 USER_STATISTICS 表是在引进MariaDB的5.2.0为部分用户统计功能。

trans-unit.source: The USER_VARIABLES table is created when the user_variables plugin is enabled, and contains information about user-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 启用 user_variables 插件时将创建 USER_VARIABLES 表，该表包含有关用户定义的变量的信息。

trans-unit.source: The USER_VARIABLES table was introduced in MariaDB 10.2.0 as part of the user_variables plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该 USER_VARIABLES 表是在引进MariaDB的10.2.0作为部分 user_variables 插件。

trans-unit.source: The USING or AS keyword can also be used to provide a plain-text password to a plugin if it's provided as an argument to the PASSWORD() function. This is only valid for authentication plugins that have implemented a hook for the PASSWORD() function. For example, the ed25519 authentication plugin supports this:
trans-unit.target: 如果将 USING 或 AS 关键字作为PASSWORD（）函数的参数提供，则也可以用来为插件提供纯文本密码。这仅对已实现PASSWORD（）函数挂钩的身份验证插件有效。例如， ed25519 身份验证插件支持以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The Using bufferEXPLAIN output indicates that the buffer as described above will be used. The algorithm has always been in use, but has only been made visible in the EXPLAIN output since MariaDB 10.0.5.
trans-unit.target: 在 Using buffer EXPLAIN 输出指示缓冲区如上文所述将被使用。该算法一直在使用，但自MariaDB 10.0.5起，仅在 EXPLAIN 输出中可见。

trans-unit.source: The VALUES() function can still be used even from MariaDB 10.3.3, but only in INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE statements; it's a syntax error otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在 VALUES() 函数仍然可以甚至使用MariaDB的10.3.3，但只在 INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE 语句; 否则是语法错误。

trans-unit.source: The VALUES() function is meaningful only in INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE statements and returns NULL otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在 VALUES() 函数是有意义的，只是在 INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE 语句返回 NULL ，否则。

trans-unit.source: The VERSION() string may have one or more of the following suffixes:
trans-unit.target: 的 VERSION() 串可以具有以下后缀的一个或多个：

trans-unit.source: The WAIT FOR ALL SLAVES option was first added in MariaDB 10.4.4.
trans-unit.target: 在 WAIT FOR ALL SLAVES 在第一个加选项MariaDB的10.4.4。

trans-unit.source: The WHERE and LIKE clauses can be given to select rows using more general conditions, as discussed in Extended SHOW.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 WHERE 和 LIKE 子句来使用更一般的条件选择行，如Extended SHOW中所述。

trans-unit.source: The WHERE clause is applied before the GROUP BY clause. It filters non-aggregated rows before the rows are grouped together. To filter grouped rows based on aggregate values, use the HAVING clause. The HAVING clause takes any expression and evaluates it as a boolean, just like the WHERE clause. You can use grouping functions in the HAVING clause. As with the select expression, if you reference non-grouped columns in the HAVING clause, the behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在 WHERE 子句中之前应用 GROUP BY 子句。在将行分组在一起之前，它将过滤未聚合的行。要基于聚合值过滤分组的行，请使用 HAVING 子句。的 HAVING 子句采用任何表达，并评估其作为布尔，就像 WHERE 子句。您可以在 HAVING 子句中使用分组功能。与select表达式一样，如果在 HAVING 子句中引用未分组的列，则该行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: The WHERE clause, if given, indicates the condition or conditions that rows must satisfy to be selected. where_condition is an expression that evaluates to true for each row to be selected. The statement selects all rows if there is no WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 的 WHERE 子句，如果给定的，指示所述一个或多个条件的行必须满足被选择。 where_condition 是要被选择的计算结果为真为每一行的表达式。如果没有WHERE子句，该语句将选择所有行。

trans-unit.source: The WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT option starts a consistent read for storage engines such as XtraDB and InnoDB that can do so, the same as if a START TRANSACTION followed by a SELECT from any InnoDB table was issued.
trans-unit.target: 该 WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 选项启动存储引擎，如读一致性XtraDB和InnoDB可以这样做的，一样的，如果一个START TRANSACTION，后面跟一个选择任何InnoDB表发出。

trans-unit.source: The WITH PARSER index option only applies to FULLTEXT indexes and contains the fulltext parser name. The fulltext parser must be an installed plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在 WITH PARSER 索引选项仅适用于FULLTEXT索引和包含全文解析器名。全文分析器必须是已安装的插件。

trans-unit.source: The WITH ROLLUP modifer adds extra rows to the resultset that represent super-aggregate summaries. For a full description with examples, see SELECT WITH ROLLUP.
trans-unit.target: 该 WITH ROLLUP 改性剂添加额外的行表示超总量摘要的结果集。有关示例的完整描述，请参见SELECT WITH ROLLUP。

trans-unit.source: The WITH ROLLUP modifier adds extra rows to the resultset that represent super-aggregate summaries. The super-aggregated column is represented by a NULL value. Multiple aggregates over different columns will be added if there are multiple GROUP BY columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 WITH ROLLUP 修饰符添加额外的行表示超总量摘要的结果集。超级汇总的列由 NULL 值表示。如果有多个 GROUP BY 列，则将添加不同列上的多个聚合。

trans-unit.source: The WITH keyword signifies a Common Table Expression (CTE). It allows you to refer to a subquery expression many times in a query, as if having a temporary table that only exists for the duration of a query.
trans-unit.target: 的 WITH 关键字表示一个公用表表达式（CTE）。它使您可以在查询中多次引用子查询表达式，就好像有一个仅在查询期间存在的临时表一样。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_INFO plugin library contains the following plugins:
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_INFO 插件库包含以下插件：

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_INFO plugin library was first released in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_INFO 插件库最早是在发布MariaDB的10.1.2。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_MEMBERSHIP plugin creates the WSREP_MEMBERSHIP table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. The plugin also adds the SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP statement.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 插件创建 WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该插件还增加了 SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 声明。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_MEMBERSHIP table was introduced with the WSREP_INFO plugin in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 表由引进WSREP_INFO插件在MariaDB的10.1.2。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_STATUS plugin creates the WSREP_STATUS table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. The plugin also adds the SHOW WSREP_STATUS statement.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_STATUS 插件创建 WSREP_STATUS 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该插件还添加了 SHOW WSREP_STATUS 语句。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_STATUS table makes Galera node cluster membership information available through the Information Schema. The same information can be returned using the SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP statement. Only users with the SUPER can access information from this table.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_STATUS 表让加莱拉可以通过节点群集成员信息信息模式。可以使用 SHOW WSREP_MEMBERSHIP 语句返回相同的信息。只有拥有 SUPER 的用户才能访问该表中的信息。

trans-unit.source: The WSREP_STATUS table was introduced with the WSREP_INFO plugin in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 WSREP_STATUS 表由引进WSREP_INFO插件在MariaDB的10.1.2。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Directory is the directory returned by the GetWindowsDirectory function. The value may be a private Windows Directory for the application, or it may be the same as the System Windows Directory returned by the GetSystemWindowsDirectory function.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Directory 是由返回目录 GetWindowsDirectory 功能。该值可以是应用程序的专用 Windows Directory ，也可以与 GetSystemWindowsDirectory 函数返回的“ System Windows Directory ”相同。

trans-unit.source: The XA RECOVER statement shows information about all transactions which are in the PREPARED state. It does not matter which connection created the transaction: if it has been PREPARED, it appears. But this does not mean that a connection can commit or rollback a transaction which was started by another connection. Note that transactions using a 1-phase commit are never in the PREPARED state, so they cannot be shown by XA RECOVER.
trans-unit.target: 该 XA RECOVER 语句显示哪些是在所有的交易信息 PREPARED 状态。哪个连接创建了事务都无关紧要：如果已经进行了 PREPARED ，它将出现。但这并不意味着一个连接可以提交或回滚由另一个连接启动的事务。注意，使用一阶段提交的事务永远不会处于 PREPARED 状态，因此 XA RECOVER 不能显示它们。

trans-unit.source: The XTRADB_INTERNAL_HASH_TABLES table was added in MariaDB 10.0.9.
trans-unit.target: 该 XTRADB_INTERNAL_HASH_TABLES 表是在加入MariaDB的10.0.9。

trans-unit.source: The XTRADB_READ_VIEW table was added in MariaDB 10.0.9.
trans-unit.target: 该 XTRADB_READ_VIEW 表是在加入MariaDB的10.0.9。

trans-unit.source: The XTRADB_RSEG table was added in MariaDB 10.0.9.
trans-unit.target: 该 XTRADB_RSEG 表是在加入MariaDB的10.0.9。

trans-unit.source: The XXX values for MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS should be the values you got from the SHOW MASTER STATUS command you did when you finished setting up the slave.
trans-unit.target: MASTER_LOG_FILE 和 MASTER_LOG_POS 的 XXX 值应该是您完成设置从站时从 SHOW MASTER STATUS 命令获得的值。

trans-unit.source: The [ and ] characters on their own can be literally matched inside a [] block, without escaping, as long as they immediately match the opening bracket:
trans-unit.target: 的 [ 和 ] 自己字符可以从字面上一个内部匹配 [] 块，而不逸出，只要他们立即匹配开口支架：

trans-unit.source: The [NOT] DETERMINISTIC clause also affects binary logging, because the STATEMENT format can not be used to store or replicate non-deterministic statements.
trans-unit.target: 在 [NOT] DETERMINISTIC 子句也影响二进制日志，因为该 STATEMENT 的格式，不能用于存储或复制非确定性的陈述。

trans-unit.source: The [mysqld_multi] option group can be used for options that are needed for mysqld_multi itself. [mysqldN] option groups can be used for options passed to specific mysqld instances.
trans-unit.target: 的 [mysqld_multi] 选项组可用于所需要查看选项 mysqld_multi 的本身。 [mysqldN] 选项组可用于传递给特定 mysqld 实例的选项。

trans-unit.source: The [safe_mysqld] option group is primarily supported for backward compatibility. You should rename such option groups to [mysqld_safe] in MariaDB installations to prevent breakage in the future if this compatibility is removed.
trans-unit.target: 的 [safe_mysqld] 选项组主要支持向后兼容。您应该在MariaDB安装中将这些选项组重命名为 [mysqld_safe] ，以防止将来删除此兼容性时造成损坏。

trans-unit.source: The \ (backslash character) is used to escape characters. For example:
trans-unit.target: 的 \ （反斜线字符）用于转义字符。例如：

trans-unit.source: The \X escape sequence matches a character sequence that makes an "extended grapheme cluster", i.e. a composite character that consists of multiple Unicode code points.
trans-unit.target: 所述 \X 转义序列相匹配的字符序列，使该包含多个Unicode代码点“扩展字形簇”，即复合字符。

trans-unit.source: The \b assertions work well in the beginning and the end of the subject string:
trans-unit.target: 该 \b 断言在开始和主题字符串的结尾很好地工作：

trans-unit.source: The ^ character means does NOT match, for example:
trans-unit.target: 该 ^ 字符的装置确实 NOT 匹配，例如：

trans-unit.source: The _ wildcard matches a single character, not byte. It will only match a multi-byte character if it is valid in the expression's character set. For example, _ will match _utf8"€", but it will not match _latin1"€" because the Euro sign is not a valid latin1 character. If necessary, use CONVERT to use the expression in a different character set.
trans-unit.target: 该 _ 通配符匹配单个字符，而不是字节。如果在表达式的字符集中有效，则它将仅与多字节字符匹配。例如， _ 将匹配 _utf8"€" ，但将不匹配 _latin1"€" 因为欧元符号不是有效的latin1字符。如有必要，请使用 CONVERT 在其他字符集中使用表达式。

trans-unit.source: The ac_dob table is there while ac_rating and the subquery are gone. Now, if we just want to check the name of the actor:
trans-unit.target: ac_rating 和子查询消失后， ac_dob 表在那里。现在，如果我们只想检查演员的名字：

trans-unit.source: The accounts table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0
trans-unit.target: 该 accounts 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0

trans-unit.source: The auth_gssapi_client client authentication plugin receives the principal name from the server, and then uses either the gss_init_sec_context function (on Unix) or the InitializeSecurityContext function (on Windows) to establish a security context on the client.
trans-unit.target: 该 auth_gssapi_client 客户端认证插件接收主体名称从服务器，然后或者使用 gss_init_sec_context 功能（在UNIX上）或 InitializeSecurityContext 功能（在Windows上）建立在客户端的安全上下文。

trans-unit.source: The caching_sha256_password client authentication plugin is compatible with MySQL's caching_sha2_password authentication plugin, which was added in MySQL 8.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 caching_sha256_password 客户端身份验证插件与MySQL的兼容 caching_sha2_password 认证插件，这是在MySQL 8.0中添加。

trans-unit.source: The caching_sha2_password plugin is now the default authentication plugin in MySQL 8.0.4 and above, based on the value of the default_authentication_plugin system variable.
trans-unit.target: 所述 caching_sha2_password 插件现在是默认的验证在MySQL 8.0.4和上述插件，基于该值 default_authentication_plugin 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: The client_ed25519 client authentication plugin hashes and signs the password using the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) before sending it to the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 client_ed25519 客户端身份验证插件哈希和标志使用密码椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）将其发送到服务器之前。

trans-unit.source: The combinations file defines few sets of alternative configurations, and every test in this suite will be run many times - once for every configuration. This can be used, for example, to run all replication tests in the rpl suite for all three binlog format modes (row, statement, and mixed). A corresponding combinations file would look as following:
trans-unit.target: 该 combinations 文件定义了几套备选配置，并在这套房每一个测试将运行多次-一次对于每个配置。例如，它可以用于在rpl套件中针对所有三种binlog格式模式（行，语句和混合）运行所有复制测试。相应的 combinations 文件如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The combinations file should be located in the suite directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 combinations 文件应位于该套件目录。

trans-unit.source: The cond_instances table lists all conditions while the server is executing. A condition, or instrumented condition object, is an internal code mechanism used for signalling that a specific event has occurred so that any threads waiting for this condition can continue.
trans-unit.target: 该 cond_instances 在服务器执行表列出了所有的条件。条件或检测到的条件对象是一种内部代码机制，用于发信号通知已发生特定事件，以便等待该条件的所有线程都可以继续。

trans-unit.source: The cond_instances table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0
trans-unit.target: 该 cond_instances 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0

trans-unit.source: The connection_id value in the above calculation is the same monotonically increasing number that you can use to identify connections in SHOW PROCESSLIST output or the information_schema.PROCESSLIST table.
trans-unit.target: 上面的计算中的 connection_id 值是相同的单调递增数字，可用于在 SHOW PROCESSLIST 输出或 information_schema.PROCESSLIST 表中标识连接。

trans-unit.source: The connection_name is used when you are using multi-source-replication. If you don't specify it, it's set to the value of the default_master_connection system variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 connection_name 是当您使用使用多源复制。如果未指定，则将其设置为default_master_connection系统变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The connection_name option was added as part of multi-source replication added in MariaDB 10.0
trans-unit.target: 所述 connection_name 选项中加入作为其一部分的多源复制在加入MariaDB的10.0

trans-unit.source: The constraint_name is optional. If you don't provide one in the ALTER TABLE statement, MariaDB auto-generates a name for you. This is done so that you can remove it later using DROP CONSTRAINT clause.
trans-unit.target: 该 constraint_name 命令是可选的。如果您未在 ALTER TABLE 语句中提供名称，那么MariaDB会自动为您生成一个名称。这样做是为了以后可以使用 DROP CONSTRAINT 子句将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The cracklib_password_check plugin can also be installed via a package manager on Linux. In order to do so, your system needs to be configured to install from one of the MariaDB repositories.
trans-unit.target: 该 cracklib_password_check 插件也可以通过在Linux上的软件包管理器进行安装。为此，需要将系统配置为从MariaDB存储库之一进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The cracklib_password_check plugin is included in systemdbinary tarballs on Linux, but not in the older generic and glibc_214 tarballs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cracklib_password_check 插件包含在 systemd 二进制压缩包在Linux上，而不是在旧通用和 glibc_214 压缩包。

trans-unit.source: The cracklib_password_check plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 cracklib_password_check 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.1.2。

trans-unit.source: The cracklib_password_check plugin's shared library is included in MariaDB packages as the cracklib_password_check.so or cracklib_password_check.dll shared library on systems where it can be built. The plugin was first included in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 cracklib_password_check 插件的共享库包含在MariaDB的包作为 cracklib_password_check.so 或 cracklib_password_check.dll 在那里可以建立系统的共享库。该插件最初包含在MariaDB 10.1.2中。

trans-unit.source: The cycle_count column is incremented every time the sequence wraps around.
trans-unit.target: 该 cycle_count 列每递增的顺序环绕时间。

trans-unit.source: The db_name argument indicates the database containing the tables to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 的 db_name 参数指示要转换包含表的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The dialog client authentication plugin transmits the password to the server in clear text. Therefore, when you use the pam authentication plugin, it is incredibly important to encrypt client connections using TLS to prevent the clear-text passwords from being seen by unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: 该 dialog 的客户端认证插件发送密码以明文的服务器。因此，当您使用 pam 身份验证插件时，使用TLS加密客户端连接以防止未经授权的用户看到明文密码非常重要。

trans-unit.source: The dialog client authentication plugin was developed by MariaDB, so MySQL's clients and client libraries as well as third party applications that bundle MySQL's client libraries do not support the dialog client authentication plugin out of the box. If the server tells an unsupported client to use the dialog client authentication plugin, then the client is likely to throw an error like the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 dialog 的客户端身份验证插件是由MariaDB的开发，所以MySQL的客户端和客户端库以及第三方应用程序捆绑MySQL的客户端库不支持 dialog 客户端身份验证对话框的插件了。如果服务器告诉不支持的客户端使用 dialog 客户端身份验证插件，则该客户端可能会引发如下错误：

trans-unit.source: The ed25519 authentication plugin uses Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) to securely store users' passwords and to authenticate users. The ed25519 algorithm is the same one that is used by OpenSSH. It is based on the elliptic curve and code created by Daniel J. Bernstein.
trans-unit.target: 该 ed25519 认证插件使用椭圆曲线数字签名算法（ECDSA）来安全地存储用户的密码和用户进行身份验证。所述ed25519算法是相同的一个所用的OpenSSH。它基于Daniel J. Bernstein创建的椭圆曲线和代码。

trans-unit.source: The ed25519 authentication plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.1.22 and MariaDB 10.2.5.
trans-unit.target: 该 ed25519 认证插件首先在发布MariaDB的22年1月10日和MariaDB的10.2.5。

trans-unit.source: The enable_prepare_warnings command changes this so that warnings from both the prepare and execute phase are shown, regardless of whether the statement produces a result set in the execute phase. The disable_prepare_warnings command reverts to the default behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 所述 enable_prepare_warnings 命令，以便改变这一点，同时从准备和执行阶段的警告显示，无论是否声明产生在执行阶段的结果集。该 disable_prepare_warnings 命令恢复到默认的行为。

trans-unit.source: The event_time field in the mysql.general_log table and the start_time, query_time, and lock_time fields in the mysql.slow_log table now store values with microsecond precision.
trans-unit.target: 该 event_time 领域mysql.general_log表和 start_time ， query_time 和 lock_time 在田里mysql.slow_log现在表存储与微秒精度值。

trans-unit.source: The events_stages_current table contains current stage events, with each row being a record of a thread and its most recent stage event.
trans-unit.target: 该 events_stages_current 表包含当前阶段的活动，每行是一个线程和其最近的舞台活动的记录。

trans-unit.source: The events_stages_current table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0
trans-unit.target: 该 events_stages_current 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0

trans-unit.source: The events_stages_history table by default contains the ten most recent completed stage events per thread. This number can be adjusted by setting the performance_schema_events_stages_history_size system variable when the server starts up.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， events_stages_history 表包含每个线程的十个最近完成的阶段事件。服务器启动时，可以通过设置performance_schema_events_stages_history_size系统变量来调整此数字。

trans-unit.source: The events_stages_history_long table by default contains the ten thousand most recent completed stage events. This number can be adjusted by setting the performance_schema_events_stages_history_long_size system variable when the server starts up.

trans-unit.source: The events_statements_current table contains current statement events, with each row being a record of a thread and its most recent statement event.
trans-unit.target: 该 events_statements_current 表包含当前语句事件，每行是一个线程和其最近的声明事件的记录。

trans-unit.source: The events_statements_history table by default contains the ten most recent completed statement events per thread. This number can be adjusted by setting the performance_schema_events_statements_history_size system variable when the server starts up.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， events_statements_history 表包含每个线程十个最近完成的语句事件。服务器启动时，可以通过设置performance_schema_events_statements_history_size系统变量来调整此数字。

trans-unit.source: The events_statements_history_long table by default contains the ten thousand most recent completed statement events. This number can be adjusted by setting the performance_schema_events_statements_history_long_size system variable when the server starts up.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， events_statements_history_long 表包含一万个最近完成的语句事件。服务器启动时，可以通过设置performance_schema_events_statements_history_long_size系统变量来调整此数字。

trans-unit.source: The events_statements_summary_by_digest table is limited in size by the performance_schema_digests_size system variable. Once the limit has been reached and the table is full, all entries are aggregated in a row with a NULL digest. The COUNT_STAR value of this NULL row indicates how many digests are recorded in the row and therefore gives an indication of whether performance_schema_digests_size should be increased to provide more accurate statistics.
trans-unit.target: 所述 events_statements_summary_by_digest 表在尺寸上被限制performance_schema_digests_size系统变量。一旦达到限制并且表已满，所有条目将以 NULL 摘要汇总在一行中。此 NULL 行的 COUNT_STAR 值指示该行中记录了多少摘要，因此指示是否应增加 performance_schema_digests_size 以提供更准确的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: The file_instances table lists instances of instruments seen by the Performance Schema when executing file I/O instrumentation, and the associated files. Only files that have been opened, and that have not been deleted, will be listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 file_instances 执行文件时性能架构看到仪器表列出实例I / O仪器，以及相关的文件。该表仅列出已打开但尚未删除的文件。

trans-unit.source: The file_name is the .MYI index file. The extension can be omitted, although keeping it permits wildcards, such as:
trans-unit.target: 该 file_name 是 .MYI 索引文件。尽管保留扩展名允许使用通配符，但可以省略该扩展名，例如：

trans-unit.source: The galera_recovery script recovers the position of a node by running mysqld with the wsrep_recover option.
trans-unit.target: 该 galera_recovery 脚本恢复节点的运行位置 mysqld 与 wsrep_recover 选项。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin allows the user to authenticate with services that use the Generic Security Services Application Program Interface (GSSAPI). Windows has a slightly different but very similar API called Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). The GSSAPI is a standardized API described in RFC2743 and RFC2744. The client and server negotiate using a standardized protocol described in RFC7546.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 认证插件允许用户进行身份验证与使用服务的通用安全服务应用程序接口（GSSAPI） 。Windows有一个稍微不同但非常相似的API，称为安全支持提供程序接口（SSPI）。GSSAPI是RFC2743和RFC2744中描述的标准化API 。客户端和服务器使用RFC7546中描述的标准化协议进行协商。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin can also be installed via a package manager on Linux. In order to do so, your system needs to be configured to install from one of the MariaDB repositories.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 身份验证插件也可以通过在Linux上的软件包管理器进行安装。为此，需要将系统配置为从MariaDB存储库之一进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin is included in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 身份验证插件包含在二进制压缩包在Linux上。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin is included in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 身份验证插件包含在MSI和ZIP在Windows上的包。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin is most often used for authenticating with Microsoft Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 身份验证插件最常用于与验证Microsoft Active Directory的。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.1.11.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 认证插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.1.11。

trans-unit.source: The gssapi authentication plugin's shared library is included in MariaDB packages as the auth_gssapi.so or auth_gssapi.dll shared library on systems where it can be built. The plugin was first included in MariaDB 10.1.11.
trans-unit.target: 该 gssapi 身份验证插件的共享库包含在MariaDB的包作为 auth_gssapi.so 或 auth_gssapi.dll 在那里可以建立系统的共享库。该插件最初包含在MariaDB 10.1.11中。

trans-unit.source: The host_cache table contains host and IP information from the host_cache, used for avoiding DNS lookups for new client connections.
trans-unit.target: 该 host_cache 表包含来自host_cache主机和IP信息，用于避免新的客户端连接的DNS查找。

trans-unit.source: The host_cache table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 host_cache 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The host_cache table, along with the host_cache, is cleared with FLUSH HOSTS, TRUNCATE TABLEhost_cache or by setting the host_cache_size system variable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 的 host_cache 表，用沿 host_cache ，与清零FLUSH HOSTS，TRUNCATE TABLE host_cache 或通过设置host_cache_size在运行时系统变量。

trans-unit.source: The hosts table contains a row for each host used by clients to connect to the server, containing current and total connections.
trans-unit.target: 所述 hosts 表包含使用客户端连接到服务器时，含有电流和总连接每个主机的行。

trans-unit.source: The hosts table was added in MariaDB 10.0 (along with many other new Performance Schema tables).
trans-unit.target: 该 hosts 在加入表MariaDB的10.0（以及许多其他新的性能架构表）。

trans-unit.source: The information_schema.SYSTEM_VARIABLES table was introduced in MariaDB 10.1.1
trans-unit.target: 该 information_schema.SYSTEM_VARIABLES 表是在引进MariaDB的10.1.1

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup SST method has its own logging outside of the MariaDB Server logging.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup SST方法有MariaDB的服务器日志记录的自己的日志之外。

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup SST method uses the Mariabackup utility for performing SSTs. It is one of the methods that does not block the donor node. Mariabackup was originally forked from Percona XtraBackup, and similarly, the mariabackup SST method was originally forked from the xtrabackup-v2 SST method.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup SST方法使用Mariabackup用于执行的SST效用。它是不阻塞施主节点的方法之一。Mariabackup最初是从Percona XtraBackup派生的，类似地， mariabackup SST方法最初是从 xtrabackup-v2 SST方法派生的。

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup SST method uses the Mariabackup utility for performing SSTs. See mariabackup SST method for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup SST方法使用Mariabackup用于执行的SST效用。有关更多信息，请参见mariabackup SST方法。

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup SST method was first released in MariaDB 10.1.26 and MariaDB 10.2.10.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup SST方法最早是在发布MariaDB的26年1月10日和MariaDB的10.2.10。

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup executable is included in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup 可执行文件包含在二进制压缩包在Linux上。

trans-unit.source: The mariabackup executable is included in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariabackup 可执行文件包含在MSI和ZIP在Windows上的包。

trans-unit.source: The mariadb-server and mariadb-client packages are virtual packages, they only exist to require the installation of the mariadb-server-5.5 and mariadb-client-5.5 packages, respectively. MariaDB will function normally with a, for example, version 5.5.30 version of the mariadb-server package and a version 5.5.29 version of the mariadb-server-5.5 package. No data is at risk. However, expected behavior is for 'apt-get install mariadb-server' to upgrade everything to the latest version (if a new version is available), so this is definitely a bug.
trans-unit.target: 该 mariadb-server 和 mariadb-client 包是虚拟包，它们只存在于需要安装 mariadb-server-5.5 和 mariadb-client-5.5 软件包中。 MariaDB将正常运行，例如 mariadb-server 软件包的5.5.30版本和 mariadb-server-5.5 软件包的5.5.29版本。没有数据有风险。但是，预期的行为是' apt-get install mariadb-server '将所有内容升级到最新版本（如果有新版本可用），因此，这绝对是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The master-info-file (normally master.info) with a multi- prefix. This contains all master connections in use.
trans-unit.target: 具有 multi- 前缀的 master-info-file （通常为 master.info ）。这包含所有正在使用的主连接。

trans-unit.source: The materialization=on|off flag is shared with Non-semijoin materialization.
trans-unit.target: 的 materialization=on|off 标志与共享非半连接物化。

trans-unit.source: The metadata_lock_info plugin was added in MariaDB 10.0.7.
trans-unit.target: 该 metadata_lock_info 中加入插件MariaDB的10.0.7。

trans-unit.source: The msql2mysql utility performs the conversion of mSQL C API function calls to their MySQL equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 所述 msql2mysql 实用程序执行mSQL的C API函数调用它们的MySQL等同物的转化率。

trans-unit.source: The mutex_instances table lists all mutexes that the Performance Schema seeing while the server is executing.
trans-unit.target: 该 mutex_instances 表列出了所有互斥的性能架构，而服务器正在执行看到。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.column_stats table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.column_stats 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.column_stats table is one of three tables storing data used for Engine-independent table statistics added in MariaDB 10.0.1. The others are mysql.table_stats and mysql.index_stats.The histogram fields were added in MariaDB 10.0.2 as part of the Histogram-based Statistics feature.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql.column_stats 表是三个表存储用于数据的一个独立于发动机的表统计中加入MariaDB的10.0.1。其他是mysql.table_stats和mysql.index_stats。直方图字段是在MariaDB 10.0.2中添加的，这是基于直方图的统计信息功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.column_stats table was introduced as part of the Engine-independent table statistics feature implemented in MariaDB 10.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.column_stats 表被引入作为的一部分独立于发动机的表统计功能中实现MariaDB的10.0.1。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.columns_priv table contains information about column-level privileges. The table can be queried and although it is possible to directly update it, it is best to use GRANT for setting privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.columns_priv 表包含列级权限的信息。可以查询该表，尽管可以直接对其进行更新，但是最好使用GRANT设置权限。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.columns_priv table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.columns_priv 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.db table contains information about database-level privileges. The table can be queried and although it is possible to directly update it, it is best to use GRANT for setting privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.db 表包含有关数据库级权限的信息。可以查询该表，尽管可以直接对其进行更新，但是最好使用GRANT设置权限。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.db table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.db 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.event table contains information about MariaDB events. Similar information can be obtained by viewing the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.EVENTS table, or with the SHOW EVENTS and SHOW CREATE EVENT statements.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.event 表包含MariaDB的信息事件。通过查看INFORMATION_SCHEMA.EVENTS表或使用SHOW EVENTS和SHOW CREATE EVENT语句，可以获得类似的信息。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.event table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.event 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.func table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.func 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.func table stores information about user-defined functions (UDFs) created with the CREATE FUNCTION UDF statement.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql.func 表存储有关信息的用户定义函数与所创建的（UDF）的CREATE FUNCTION UDF语句。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.general_log table stores the contents of the General Query Log if general logging is active and the output is being written to table (see Writing logs into tables).
trans-unit.target: 如果常规日志记录处于活动状态并且输出正在写入表中，则 mysql.general_log 表存储常规查询日志的内容（请参见将日志写入表中）。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.global_priv table contains information about users that have permission to access the MariaDB server, and their global privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.global_priv 表包含有权限访问MariaDB的服务器的用户，他们的全球权限的信息。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.global_priv table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.global_priv 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.global_priv table was introduced in MariaDB 10.4.1 to replace the mysql.user table.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.global_priv 表是在引进MariaDB的10.4.1更换mysql.user表。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.gtid_slave_pos table is used in replication by slave servers to keep track of their current position (the global transaction ID of the last transaction applied). Using the table allows the slave to maintain a consistent value for the gtid_slave_pos system variable across server restarts. See Global Transaction ID.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表中使用复制的从属服务器来跟踪自己的当前位置（施加的最后事务的全局事务ID）。使用该表可使从属服务器在服务器重新启动期间为gtid_slave_pos系统变量保持一致的值。请参阅全球交易ID。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.gtid_slave_pos table should not be changed manually in any other way. From MariaDB 10.3.1, it is preferable to use the gtid_pos_auto_engines server variable to get the GTID position updates to use the TokuDB or RocksDB storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表不应该以任何其他方式手动更改。从MariaDB 10.3.1开始，最好使用 gtid_pos_auto_engines 服务器变量来获取GTID位置更新，以使用TokuDB或RocksDB存储引擎。
