trans-unit.source: The mysql.index_stats table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.index_stats 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.index_stats table is one of three tables storing data used for Engine-independent table statistics added in MariaDB 10.0.1. The others are mysql.column_stats and mysql.table_stats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql.index_stats 表是三个表存储用于数据的一个独立于发动机的表统计中加入MariaDB的10.0.1。其他的是mysql.column_stats和mysql.table_stats。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.index_stats table was introduced as part of the Engine-independent table statistics feature implemented in MariaDB 10.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.index_stats 表被引入作为的一部分独立于发动机的表统计功能中实现MariaDB的10.0.1。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.innodb_index_stats table stores data related to particular InnoDB Persistent Statistics, and contains multiple rows for each index.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.innodb_index_stats 表存储与特定数据InnoDB的持续统计，并包含每个索引多行。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.innodb_table_stats table stores data related to InnoDB Persistent Statistics, and contains one row per table.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.innodb_table_stats 表存储与数据InnoDB的持续统计，并包含每个表中的一行。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.ndb_binlog_index table is not used by MariaDB. It was kept for MySQL compatibility reasons, and is used there for MySQL Cluster. It was removed in MariaDB 10.0.4.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.ndb_binlog_index 表不使用MariaDB的。出于MySQL兼容性的原因保留它，并将其用于MySQL Cluster。它已在MariaDB 10.0.4中删除。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.plugin table can be queried to get information about installed plugins.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.plugin 表可以查询，以获取有关安装信息的插件。

trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.plugin 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.proc table contains information about stored procedures and stored functions. It contains similar information to that stored in the INFORMATION SCHEMA.ROUTINES table.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.proc 的表包含的信息存储过程和存储功能。它包含与INFORMATION SCHEMA.ROUTINES表中存储的信息类似的信息。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.proc table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.proc 的表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.procs_priv 表包含有关信息的存储过程和存储功能的权限。有关创建它们的信息，请参见CREATE PROCEDURE和CREATE FUNCTION。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.server script starts mysqld by first changing to the MariaDB install directory and then calling mysqld_safe.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.server 的脚本启动 mysqld 的首先变化到MariaDB的安装目录，然后调用 mysqld_safe 的。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.servers table contains information about servers as used by the Spider, FEDERATED or FederatedX storage engines (see CREATE SERVER).
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.servers 表包含大约13759的服务器的信息蜘蛛，FEDERATED或FederatedX存储引擎（见CREATE SERVER）。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.table_stats table is one of three tables storing data used for Engine-independent table statistics added in MariaDB 10.0.1. The others are mysql.column_stats and mysql.index_stats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql.table_stats 表是三个表存储用于数据的一个独立于发动机的表统计中加入MariaDB的10.0.1。其他的是mysql.column_stats和mysql.index_stats。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.time_zone table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.time_zone 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.time_zone table is one of the mysql system tables that can contain time zone information. It is usually preferable for the system to handle the time zone, in which case the table will be empty (the default), but you can populate the mysql time zone tables using the mysql_tzinfo_to_sql utility. See Time Zones for details.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.time_zone 表是可以包含MySQL的系统表中的一个时区的信息。通常最好让系统处理时区，在这种情况下，表将为空（默认值），但是您可以使用mysql_tzinfo_to_sql实用程序填充mysql时区表。有关详细信息，请参见时区。

It is usually preferable for the system to handle the time zone, in which case the table will be empty (the default), but you can populate the mysql time zone tables using the mysql_tzinfo_to_sql utility. See Time Zones for details.

See Time Zones for details.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.time_zone_transition_type 表是一个 mysql ，可以包含系统表的时区信息。通常最好让系统处理时区，在这种情况下，表将为空（默认值），但是您可以使用mysql_tzinfo_to_sql实用程序填充 mysql 时区表。有关详细信息，请参见时区。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.transaction_registry table is used for transaction-precise versioning, and contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql.transaction_registry 表用于交易精确版本，并包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql.transaction_registry table was introduced in MariaDB 10.3.4 as part of system-versioned tables.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.transaction_registry 表是在引进MariaDB的10.3.4作为一部分系统版本表。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.user table contains information about users that have permission to access the MariaDB server, and their global privileges. The table can be queried and although it is possible to directly update it, it is best to use GRANT and CREATE USER for adding users and privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.user 表包含有权限访问MariaDB的服务器的用户，他们的全球权限的信息。可以查询该表，尽管可以直接对其进行更新，但是最好使用GRANT和CREATE USER添加用户和特权。

trans-unit.source: The mysql.user table contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql.user 表包含以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin also only supports PAM services that ask the user a single question.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件也只支持PAM服务，询问用户一个问题。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin and the pam_use_cleartext_plugin system variable were first added in MariaDB 5.5.32 and MariaDB 10.1.1.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql_clear_password 客户端认证插件和 pam_use_cleartext_plugin 在首先加入系统变量MariaDB的32年5月5日和MariaDB的10.1.1。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin is compatible with MySQL clients and most MySQL client libraries, while the dialog client authentication plugin is not always compatible with them. Therefore, the mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin is most useful if you need some kind of MySQL compatibility in your environment, but you still want to use the pam authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件是使用MySQL客户端和大多数MySQL客户端库兼容，而 dialog 的客户端身份验证插件并非总是与其兼容。因此，如果您的环境中需要某种MySQL兼容性，则 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件最有用，但是您仍想使用 pam 身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin is similar to MySQL's mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件类似于MySQL的 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin only supports PAM services that require password-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件只支持那些需要基于密码的验证PAM服务。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin transmits the password to the server in clear text. Therefore, when you use the pam authentication plugin, it is incredibly important to encrypt client connections using TLS to prevent the clear-text passwords from being seen by unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_clear_password 客户端认证插件发送密码以明文的服务器。因此，在使用 pam 身份验证插件时，使用TLS加密客户端连接以防止未经授权的用户看到明文密码非常重要。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_fix_privilege_tables script is not actually called; it's included as part of mysql_upgrade
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_fix_privilege_tables 脚本实际上并没有所谓的; 它包含在 mysql_upgrade 中

trans-unit.source: The mysql_install_db.exe utility is the Windows equivalent of mysql_install_db.
trans-unit.target: Windows上的 mysql_install_db.exe 实用程序与mysql_install_db等效。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_native_password authentication plugin is one of the conventional authentication plugins, so all client libraries should support it.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_native_password 认证插件是传统的验证插件之一，因此，所有客户端库应该支持。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_native_password authentication plugin is statically linked into the server, so no installation is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_native_password 认证插件静态链接到服务器，所以没有安装是必要的。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_native_password authentication plugin is the default authentication plugin that will be used for an account created when no authentication plugin is explicitly mentioned and old_passwords=0 is set. It uses the password hashing algorithm introduced in MySQL 4.1, which is also used by the PASSWORD() function when old_passwords=0 is set. This hashing algorithm is based on SHA-1.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql_native_password 认证插件是插件，缺省的认证将被用于当明确提到没有认证插件和创建的帐户 old_passwords=0 被设置。它使用MySQL 4.1中引入的密码哈希算法，当设置 old_passwords=0 时， PASSWORD() 函数也使用该算法。该哈希算法基于SHA-1。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_native_password client authentication plugin hashes the password before sending it to the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_native_password 客户端身份验证插件将其发送到服务器之前散列密码。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_old_password authentication plugin is one of the conventional authentication plugins, so all client libraries should support it.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_old_password 认证插件是传统的验证插件之一，因此，所有客户端库应该支持。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_old_password authentication plugin is statically linked into the server, so no installation is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_old_password 认证插件静态链接到服务器，所以没有安装是必要的。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_old_password authentication plugin is the default authentication plugin that will be used for an account created when no authentication plugin is explicitly mentioned and old_passwords=1 is set. It uses the pre-MySQL 4.1 password hashing algorithm, which is also used by the OLD_PASSWORD() function and by the PASSWORD() function when old_passwords=1 is set.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mysql_old_password 认证插件是插件，缺省的认证将被用于当明确提到没有认证插件和创建的帐户 old_passwords=1 是集。它使用MySQL 4.1之前的密码哈希算法，当设置 old_passwords=1 时， OLD_PASSWORD() 函数和 PASSWORD() 函数也使用该算法。

trans-unit.source: The mysql_old_password client authentication plugin hashes the password before sending it to the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysql_old_password 客户端身份验证插件将其发送到服务器之前散列密码。

trans-unit.source: The mysqld_multi startup script is in MariaDB distributions on Linux and Unix. It is a wrapper that is designed to manage several mysqld processes running on the same host. In order for multiple mysqld processes to work on the same host, these processes must:
trans-unit.target: 该 mysqld_multi 的启动脚本是在Linux和Unix MariaDB的分布。它是一个包装程序，旨在管理在同一主机上运行的多个 mysqld 进程。为了使多个 mysqld 进程在同一主机上工作，这些进程必须：

trans-unit.source: The mysqld_safe startup script is in MariaDB distributions on Linux and Unix. It is a wrapper that starts mysqld with some extra safety features. For example, if mysqld_safe notices that mysqld has crashed, then mysqld_safe will automatically restart mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysqld_safe 的启动脚本是在Linux和Unix MariaDB的分布。它是一个包装，使用一些额外的安全功能启动 mysqld 。例如，如果 mysqld_safe 注意到 mysqld 已崩溃，则 mysqld_safe 将自动重启 mysqld 。

trans-unit.source: The mysqldump client is a backup program originally written by Igor Romanenko. It can be used to dump a database or a collection of databases for backup or transfer to another database server (not necessarily MariaDB or MySQL). The dump typically contains SQL statements to create the table, populate it, or both. However, mysqldump can also be used to generate files in CSV, other delimited text, or XML format.
trans-unit.target: 该 mysqldump 的客户端最初是由伊戈尔·罗曼写入的备份程序。它可以用于转储数据库或数据库集合以进行备份或转移到其他数据库服务器（不一定是MariaDB或MySQL）。转储通常包含用于创建表，填充表或两者的SQL语句。但是， mysqldump 也可以用于生成CSV，其他定界文本或XML格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: The named_pipe authentication plugin allows the user to use operating system credentials when connecting to MariaDB via named pipe on Windows. Named pipe connections are enabled by the named_pipe system variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 named_pipe 认证插件允许用户使用通过命名管道连接到MariaDB的Windows上，当操作系统凭据。命名管道连接由 named_pipe 系统变量启用。

trans-unit.source: The named_pipe authentication plugin does not require any special support in client libraries. It should work with all client libraries.
trans-unit.target: 该 named_pipe 认证插件不需要在客户端库中的任何特殊支持。它应与所有客户端库一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The named_pipe authentication plugin does not require any specific client authentication plugins. It should work with all clients.
trans-unit.target: 该 named_pipe 认证插件并不需要任何特定的客户端身份验证插件。它应该与所有客户一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The named_pipe authentication plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.1.11.
trans-unit.target: 该 named_pipe 认证插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.1.11。

trans-unit.source: The named_pipe authentication plugin works by using named pipe impersonation and calling GetUserName() to retrieve the user name of the process that is connected to the named pipe. Once it has the user name, it authenticates the connecting user as the MariaDB account that has the same user name.
trans-unit.target: 该 named_pipe 认证插件的工作原理是使用命名管道模拟并调用 GetUserName() 来检索连接到命名管道过程中的用户名。一旦拥有用户名，它就将连接用户认证为具有相同用户名的MariaDB帐户。

trans-unit.source: The objects_summary_global_by_type table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 objects_summary_global_by_type 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The pam authentication plugin allows MariaDB to offload user authentication to the system's Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) framework. PAM is an authentication framework used by Linux, FreeBSD, Solaris, and other Unix-like operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam 认证插件允许MariaDB的卸载用户认证系统的插入认证模块（PAM）的框架。PAM是Linux，FreeBSD，Solaris和其他类似Unix的操作系统使用的身份验证框架。

trans-unit.source: The pam authentication plugin allows MariaDB to offload user authentication to the system's Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) framework. PAM is an authentication framework used by Linux, FreeBSD, Solaris, and other Unix-like operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pam 身份验证插件，MariaDB可以将用户身份验证卸载到系统的可插入身份验证模块（PAM）框架中。PAM是Linux，FreeBSD，Solaris和其他类似Unix的操作系统使用的身份验证框架。

trans-unit.source: The pam authentication plugin tells MariaDB to delegate the authentication to the PAM authentication framework. How exactly that authentication is performed depends on how PAM was configured.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam 认证插件告诉MariaDB的委托认证的PAM认证框架。执行身份验证的确切方式取决于PAM的配置方式。

trans-unit.source: The pam authentication plugin's library is provided in binary packages in all releases on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam 认证插件的库中提供的二进制软件包在Linux上的所有版本。

trans-unit.source: The pam_google_authenticator PAM module provides two-factor identification with Google Authenticator. It is from Google's google-authenticator-libpam open-source project. The PAM module should work with the open-source mobile apps built by Google's google-authenticator and google-authenticator-android projects as well as the the closed source Google Authenticator mobile apps that are present in each mobile app store.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam_google_authenticator PAM模块提供与谷歌身份验证双因素身份。它来自Google的 google-authenticator-libpam 开源项目。PAM模块应与由Google的 google-authenticator 和 google-authenticator-android 项目构建的开源移动应用程序以及每个移动应用程序商店中提供的封闭源Google Authenticator移动应用程序一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The pam_lsass PAM module provides support for Active Directory authentication. It is provided by PowerBroker Identity Services – Open Edition.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam_lsass PAM模块提供支持的Active Directory身份验证。它由PowerBroker Identity Services-Open Edition提供。

trans-unit.source: The pam_securid PAM module provides support for multi-factor authentication. It is part of the commercial RSA SecurID Suite.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam_securid PAM模块提供了多因素认证支持。它是商业RSA SecurID Suite的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The pam_unix PAM module adds some additional configuration steps on a lot of systems. We basically have to give the user that runs mysqld access to /etc/shadow.
trans-unit.target: 在 pam_unix 的 PAM模块增加了一些额外的配置步骤上有很多的系统。基本上，我们必须给运行 mysqld 的用户访问 /etc/shadow 的权限。

trans-unit.source: The pam_user_map PAM module can easily be built by downloading plugin/auth_pam/mapper/pam_user_map.c file from the MariaDB source tree and compiling it. Once it is built, it can be installed to the system's PAM module directory, which is typically /lib64/security/. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该 pam_user_map PAM模块可以很容易地通过下载来构建 plugin/auth_pam/mapper/pam_user_map.c 从MariaDB的源代码树中的文件和编译它。构建完成后，可以将其安装到系统的PAM模块目录（通常为 /lib64/security/ 。例如：

trans-unit.source: The pam_user_map PAM module is not currently packaged or built by MariaDB, so installing it from source is currently the only option. See MDEV-17292 about that.
trans-unit.target: 该 pam_user_map PAM模块当前没有包装或MariaDB的建成，所以从源代码安装这是目前唯一的选择。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-17292。

trans-unit.source: The pam_user_map PAM module uses the configuration file at the path /etc/security/user_map.conf to determine its user and group mappings. The file's format is described below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pam_user_map PAM模块使用配置文件在路径 /etc/security/user_map.conf 以确定其用户和组映射。该文件的格式如下所述。

trans-unit.source: The partitioning_expression is an SQL expression that returns a value from each row. In the simplest cases, it is a column name. This value is used to determine which partition should contain a row.
trans-unit.target: 所述 partitioning_expression 是一个SQL表达式，返回从各行的值。在最简单的情况下，它是列名。此值用于确定哪个分区应包含一行。

trans-unit.source: The performance_timers table lists available event timers.
trans-unit.target: 该 performance_timers 表列出了可用的事件计时器。

trans-unit.source: The proxy directory contains a MySQL/MariaDB proxy. It can be used to transmit data between Shard-Query and applications, so that client programs don't need to know Shard-Query. The proxy is a Lua script which uses the JSON for Lua library.
trans-unit.target: 该 proxy 目录中包含一个MySQL / MariaDB的代理。它可用于在Shard-Query和应用程序之间传输数据，因此客户端程序不需要了解Shard-Query。代理是一个Lua脚本，它使用JSON编写Lua库。

trans-unit.source: The query_response_time plugin creates the QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. The plugin also adds the SHOW QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME and FLUSH QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME statements.
trans-unit.target: 该 query_response_time 插件创建 QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该插件还添加了 SHOW QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME 和 FLUSH QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME 语句。

trans-unit.source: The query_response_time plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.0.4.
trans-unit.target: 该 query_response_time 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.0.4。

trans-unit.source: The replace_regex command supports paired delimiters (like in perl, etc). If the first non-space character in the replace_regex argument is one of (, [, {, <, then the pattern should end with ), ], }, > accordingly. The replacement string can use its own pair of delimiters, not necessarily the same as the pattern. If the first non-space character in the replace_regex argument is not one of the above, then it should also separate the pattern and the replacement string and it should end the replacement string. Backslash can be used to escape the current terminating character as usual. The examples below demonstrate valid usage of replace_regex:
trans-unit.target: 所述 replace_regex 命令支持成对分隔符（在Perl等）。如果 replace_regex 参数中的第一个非空格字符是 ( ， [ ， { ， < ，）中的一个，则模式应相应地以 ) ， ] ， } ， > 结尾。替换字符串可以使用自己的一对定界符，不一定与模式相同。如果 replace_regex 中的第一个非空格字符参数不是上述参数之一，那么它还应该将模式和替换字符串分开，并且应该在替换字符串结尾。反斜杠可以照常转义当前终止字符。以下示例演示了 replace_regex 的有效用法：

trans-unit.source: The root@localhost created by mysql_install_db will also be created to authenticate via the unix_socket authentication plugin in these builds.
trans-unit.target: 在这些版本中，还将创建由 mysql_install_db 创建的 root@localhost 以通过 unix_socket 身份验证插件进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The root@localhost user account created by mysql_install_db is created with the ability to use two authentication plugins.
trans-unit.target: 由 mysql_install_db 创建的 root@localhost 用户帐户可以使用两个身份验证插件来创建。

trans-unit.source: The root@localhost user created by mysql_install_db is created with the ability to use two authentication plugins. First, it is configured to try to use the unix_socket authentication plugin. This allows the the root@localhost user to login without a password via the local Unix socket file defined by the socket system variable, as long as the login is attempted from a process owned by the operating system root user account. Second, if authentication fails with the unix_socket authentication plugin, then it is configured to try to use the mysql_native_password authentication plugin. However, an invalid password is initially set, so in order to authenticate this way, a password must be set with SET PASSWORD.
trans-unit.target: 由 mysql_install_db 创建的 root@localhost 用户可以使用两个身份验证插件来创建。首先，将其配置为尝试使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件。这允许 root@localhost 用户通过 socket 系统变量定义的本地Unix套接字文件在没有密码的情况下登录，只要尝试从操作系统 root 用户帐户拥有的进程登录即可。其次，如果使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件的身份验证失败，则将其配置为尝试使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件。但是，最初设置的密码无效，因此，为了进行身份验证，必须使用 SET PASSWORD 设置密码。

trans-unit.source: The rwlock_instances table contains the following columns:
trans-unit.target: 该 rwlock_instances 表包含以下几列：

trans-unit.source: The rwlock_instances table lists all read write lock (rwlock) instances that the Performance Schema sees while the server is executing. A read write is a mechanism for ensuring threads can either share access to common resources, or have exclusive access.
trans-unit.target: 该 rwlock_instances 表列出了所有读写锁（rwlock所）情况下的性能架构，而服务器正在执行看到。读写是确保线程可以共享对公共资源的访问或具有独占访问的机制。

trans-unit.source: The select_type column can have the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该 select_type 列可以有以下值：

trans-unit.source: The server_audit plugin logs the server's activity. For each client session, it records who connected to the server (i.e., user name and host), what queries were executed, and which tables were accessed and server variables that were changed. This information is stored in a rotating log file or it may be sent to the local syslogd.
trans-unit.target: 该 server_audit 插件记录服务器的活动。对于每个客户端会话，它记录了谁连接到服务器（即用户名和主机），执行了哪些查询，访问了哪些表以及更改了服务器变量。此信息存储在循环日志文件中，或者可以将其发送到本地syslogd。

trans-unit.source: The server_audit plugin was first released in MariaDB 5.5.34.
trans-unit.target: 该 server_audit 插件首先在发布MariaDB的34年5月5日。

trans-unit.source: The server_audit plugin's shared library is included in MariaDB packages as the server_audit.so or server_audit.dll shared library on systems where it can be built.
trans-unit.target: 该 server_audit 插件的共享库包含在MariaDB的包作为 server_audit.so 或 server_audit.dll 对系统共享库在那里可以建。

trans-unit.source: The session_account_connect_attrs: table was added in MariaDB 10.0 (along with many other new Performance Schema tables).
trans-unit.target: 的 session_account_connect_attrs: 中加入表MariaDB的10.0（以及许多其他新的性能架构表）。

trans-unit.source: The session_account_connect_attrs table shows connection attributes for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 该 session_account_connect_attrs 当前会话表显示连接属性。

trans-unit.source: The session_connect_attrs table shows connection attributes for all sessions.
trans-unit.target: 该 session_connect_attrs 所有会话表显示连接属性。

trans-unit.source: The session_connect_attrs table was added in MariaDB 10.0 (along with many other new Performance Schema tables).
trans-unit.target: 该 session_connect_attrs 中加入表MariaDB的10.0（以及许多其他新的性能架构表）。

trans-unit.source: The setup_actors table contains information for determining whether monitoring should be enabled for new client connection threads.
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_actors 表包含确定是否监测应为新的客户端连接线程激活的信息。

trans-unit.source: The setup_actors table was added in MariaDB 10.0 (along with many other new Performance Schema tables).
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_actors 中加入表MariaDB的10.0（以及许多其他新的性能架构表）。

trans-unit.source: The setup_consumers table contains the following columns:
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_consumers 表包含以下几列：

trans-unit.source: The setup_instruments table contains a list of instrumented object classes for which it is possible to collect events. There is one row for each instrument in the source code. When an instrument is enabled and executed, instances are created which are then stored in the cond_instances, file_instances, mutex_instances, rwlock_instances or socket_instance tables.
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_instruments 表包含仪表对象类的列表，它可以收集事件。源代码中的每种工具都有一行。启用并执行工具后，将创建实例，然后将其存储在cond_instances，file_instances，Mutex_instances，rwlock_instances或socket_instance表中。

trans-unit.source: The setup_objects table determines whether objects are monitored by the performance schema or not. By default limited to 100 rows, this can be changed by setting the performance_schema_setup_objects_size system variable when the server starts.
trans-unit.target: 所述 setup_objects 表确定是否目的是通过性能架构或不监测。默认情况下限制为100行，可以通过在服务器启动时设置performance_schema_setup_objects_size系统变量来更改此行。

trans-unit.source: The setup_objects table was added in MariaDB 10.0 (along with many other new Performance Schema tables).
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_objects 中加入表MariaDB的10.0（以及许多其他新的性能架构表）。

trans-unit.source: The setup_timers table shows the currently selected event timers.
trans-unit.target: 该 setup_timers 表显示当前选定的事件计时器。

trans-unit.source: The sha256_password client authentication plugin is compatible with MySQL's sha256_password authentication plugin, which was added in MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 该 sha256_password 客户端身份验证插件与MySQL的兼容 sha256_password 认证插件，这是在MySQL 5.6中添加。

trans-unit.source: The simple_password_check plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该 simple_password_check 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.1.2。

trans-unit.source: The skip_replication option only has effect if binary logging is enabled and sql_log_bin is true.
trans-unit.target: 仅当启用了二进制日志记录并且sql_log_bin为true时， skip_replication 选项才有效。

trans-unit.source: The slave_domain_parallel_threads variable is dynamic and can be changed without restarting the server; all slaves must be stopped while changing it, though.
trans-unit.target: 所述 slave_domain_parallel_threads 变量是动态的并且可以在不重新启动服务器被改变; 但是，更改它时必须停止所有从站。

trans-unit.source: The socket_instances table contains the following columns:
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_instances 表包含以下几列：

trans-unit.source: The socket_instances table lists active server connections, with each record being a Unix socket file or TCP/IP connection.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_instances 表列出活动的服务器连接，每个记录是一个Unix套接字文件或TCP / IP连接。

trans-unit.source: The socket_instances table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_instances 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The socket_summary_by_event_name table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_summary_by_event_name 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The socket_summary_by_instance table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_summary_by_instance 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The sort_intersect strategy has higher overhead than intersect but is able to handle a broader set of WHERE conditions.
trans-unit.target: 该 sort_intersect 策略具有高于头顶 intersect ，但能够处理更广泛的 WHERE 条件。

trans-unit.source: The status command shows you information about which protocol is used:
trans-unit.target: 该 status 有关其使用的协议命令显示您的信息：

trans-unit.source: The symbol clause, if specified, is used in error messages and must be unique in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 symbol 子句，则在错误消息中使用该子句，并且在数据库中必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The systemctl command will block until MariaDB starts, so you will need to write the code to the socket file via a separate terminal.
trans-unit.target: 该 systemctl 命令将阻塞，直到MariaDB的开始，所以你需要通过一个单独的终端编写代码的套接字文件。

trans-unit.source: The table_io_waits_summary_by_index_usage table records table I/O waits by index.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_io_waits_summary_by_index_usage 通过索引表中的记录表I / O等待。

trans-unit.source: The table_io_waits_summary_by_index_usage table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_io_waits_summary_by_index_usage 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The table_io_waits_summary_by_table table records table I/O waits by table.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_io_waits_summary_by_table 通过表表中记录表I / O等待。

trans-unit.source: The table_io_waits_summary_by_table table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_io_waits_summary_by_table 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The table_lock_waits_summary_by_table table records table lock waits by table.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_lock_waits_summary_by_table 表由表记录表锁等待。

trans-unit.source: The table_lock_waits_summary_by_table table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 该 table_lock_waits_summary_by_table 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The threads table contains the following columns:
trans-unit.target: 该 threads 表包含以下几列：

trans-unit.source: The three_attempts authentication plugin gives the user three attempts to enter a correct password.
trans-unit.target: 该 three_attempts 认证插件为用户提供了三次输入正确的密码。

trans-unit.source: The two_questions authentication plugin asks the user for a password and a confirmation ("Are you sure?").
trans-unit.target: 该 two_questions 认证插件要求输入密码并确认用户（“你确定？”）。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin allows the user to use operating system credentials when connecting to MariaDB via the local Unix socket file. This Unix socket file is defined by the socket system variable.
trans-unit.target: 通过本地Unix套接字文件连接到MariaDB时， unix_socket 身份验证插件允许用户使用操作系统凭据。该Unix套接字文件由 socket 系统变量定义。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin can be disabled by starting the server with the unix_socket option set to OFF. This can be specified as a command-line argument to mysqld or it can be specified in a relevant server option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 认证插件可以通过启动与服务器被禁用 unix_socket 选项设置为 OFF 。可以将其指定为 mysqld 的命令行参数，也可以在选项文件中的相关服务器选项组中指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin does not require any special support in client libraries. It should work with all client libraries.
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 认证插件不需要在客户端库中的任何特殊支持。它应与所有客户端库一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin does not require any specific client authentication plugins. It should work with all clients.
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 认证插件并不需要任何特定的客户端身份验证插件。它应该与所有客户一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin is also installed by default in new installations that use the .deb packages provided by Debian's default repositories in Debian 9 and later and Ubuntu's default repositories in Ubuntu 15.10 and later, so if you do not want it to be available by default on those systems when those packages are used, then you will need to disable it. See Differences in MariaDB in Debian (and Ubuntu) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 认证插件也被默认安装新安装使用的 .deb 文件由Debian的默认存储库中的Debian 9提供的软件包及更高版本和在Ubuntu 15.10 Ubuntu的默认仓库及更高版本，所以如果你不希望它是默认可用在使用这些软件包的系统上，则需要禁用它。有关更多信息，请参见Debian（和Ubuntu）中MariaDB的差异。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin is also installed by default in new installations that use the .deb packages provided by Debian's default repositories in Debian 9 and later and Ubuntu's default repositories in Ubuntu 15.10 and later, so this step can be skipped on those systems when those packages are used. See Differences in MariaDB in Debian (and Ubuntu) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 认证插件也被默认安装新安装使用的 .deb 文件由Debian的默认存储库中的Debian 9提供的软件包及更高版本和Ubuntu的默认存储库在Ubuntu 15.10及更高版本，所以这一步可以在这些系统上时，这些软件包被跳过被使用。有关更多信息，请参见Debian（和Ubuntu）中MariaDB的差异。

trans-unit.source: The unix_socket authentication plugin works by calling the getsockopt system call with the SO_PEERCRED socket option, which allows it to retrieve the uid of the process that is connected to the socket. It is then able to get the user name associated with that uid. Once it has the user name, it will authenticate the connecting user as the MariaDB account that has the same user name.
trans-unit.target: 该 unix_socket 通过调用身份验证插件作品 getsockopt 与系统调用 SO_PEERCRED 套接字选项，这使得它能够检索 uid 连接到插座的过程。然后，它可以获取与该 uid 关联的用户名。一旦拥有用户名，它将把连接用户认证为具有相同用户名的MariaDB帐户。

trans-unit.source: The user_variables plugin creates the USER_VARIABLES table in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. This table contains information about user-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 user_variables 插件创建 USER_VARIABLES 表中的 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。该表包含有关用户定义变量的信息。

trans-unit.source: The user_variables plugin was first released in MariaDB 10.2.0
trans-unit.target: 该 user_variables 插件首先在发布MariaDB的10.2.0

trans-unit.source: The users table, along with many other new Performance Schema tables, was added in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 users 表，与其他许多新的沿性能架构表，在加入MariaDB的10.0。

trans-unit.source: The userstat plugin also adds the FLUSH USER_STATISTICS, FLUSH CLIENT_STATISTICS, FLUSH INDEX_STATISTICS, and FLUSH TABLE_STATISTICS statements, which discard the information stored in the specified information schema table.
trans-unit.target: 该 userstat 还插件添加了 FLUSH USER_STATISTICS ， FLUSH CLIENT_STATISTICS ， FLUSH INDEX_STATISTICS 和 FLUSH TABLE_STATISTICS 语句，丢弃存储在指定的信息模式表中的信息。

trans-unit.source: The userstat plugin creates the USER_STATISTICS, CLIENT_STATISTICS , the INDEX_STATISTICS, and the TABLE_STATISTICS tables in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database.
trans-unit.target: 该 userstat 插件创建 USER_STATISTICS ， CLIENT_STATISTICS 的 INDEX_STATISTICS 和 TABLE_STATISTICS 在表 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。

trans-unit.source: The userstat plugin creates the USER_STATISTICS, CLIENT_STATISTICS , the INDEX_STATISTICS, and the TABLE_STATISTICS tables in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA database. As an alternative to these tables, the plugin also adds the SHOW USER_STATISTICS, the SHOW CLIENT_STATISTICS, the SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS, and the SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS statements.
trans-unit.target: 该 userstat 插件创建 USER_STATISTICS ， CLIENT_STATISTICS 的 INDEX_STATISTICS 和 TABLE_STATISTICS 在表 INFORMATION_SCHEMA 数据库。作为这些表的替代方案，插件还添加了 SHOW USER_STATISTICS ， SHOW CLIENT_STATISTICS, the ，SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS , and the SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS statements.

trans-unit.source: The userstat plugin works by keeping several hash tables in memory. All variables are incremented while the query is running. At the end of each statement the global values are updated.
trans-unit.target: 该 userstat 通过保持几个哈希表中存储插件作品。查询运行时，所有变量均递增。在每个语句的末尾，将更新全局值。

trans-unit.source: The xid can have 3 components, though only the first one is mandatory. gtrid is a quoted string representing a global transaction identifier. bqual is a quoted string representing a local transaction identifier. formatID is an unsigned integer indicating the format used for the first two components; if not specified, defaults to 1. MariaDB does not interpret in any way these components, and only uses them to identify a transaction. xids of transactions in effect must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 该 xid 可以有3个组成部分，但只有第一个是强制性的。 gtrid 是带引号的字符串，表示全局事务标识符。 bqual 是带引号的字符串，表示本地事务标识符。 formatID 是一个无符号整数，指示用于前两个组件的格式；如果未指定，则默认为1。MariaDB不会以任何方式解释这些组件，而仅使用它们来标识事务。 xid 的交易xid必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The xtrabackup-v2 SST method has its own logging outside of the MariaDB Server logging.
trans-unit.target: 该 xtrabackup-v2 SST方法有MariaDB的服务器日志记录的自己的日志之外。

trans-unit.source: The xtrabackup-v2 SST method uses the Percona XtraBackup utility for performing SSTs. It is one of the methods that does not block the donor node.
trans-unit.target: 该 xtrabackup-v2 SST方法使用Percona的XtraBackup进行海表温度的效用。它是不阻塞施主节点的方法之一。

trans-unit.source: The xtrabackup-v2 SST method uses the Percona XtraBackup utility for performing SSTs. See xtrabackup-v2 SST method for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 xtrabackup-v2 SST方法使用Percona的XtraBackup进行海表温度的效用。有关更多信息，请参见xtrabackup-v2 SST方法。

trans-unit.source: The xtrabackup_checkpoints file contains metadata about the backup.
trans-unit.target: 该 xtrabackup_checkpoints 文件包含有关备份的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The xtrabackup_info file contains information about the backup. The fields in this file are listed below.
trans-unit.target: 该 xtrabackup_info 文件包含有关备份的信息。此文件中的字段在下面列出。

trans-unit.source: The yes-pattern is used if the condition is satisfied, otherwise the no-pattern (if any) is used.
trans-unit.target: 的 yes-pattern 用于如果满足该条件，否则 no-pattern （如果有的话）被使用。

trans-unit.source: The || operator's precedence, as well as its meaning, depends on the PIPES_AS_CONCATSQL_MODE flag: if it is on, || can be used to concatenate strings (like the CONCAT() function) and has a higher precedence.
trans-unit.target: 该 || 运算符的优先级及其含义取决于 PIPES_AS_CONCAT SQL_MODE标志：如果启用， || 。可用于连接字符串（如CONCAT（）函数），并且具有更高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The %s in the srcdef are place holders for eventual compatible parts of the original query where clause. If the select query does not specify a where clause, or a gives an unacceptable where clause, place holders will be filled by dummy clauses (1=1).
trans-unit.target: srcdef中的％s是原始查询where子句的最终兼容部分的占位符。如果select查询未指定where子句，或者a提供了不可接受的where子句，则占位符将由虚拟子句（1 = 1）填充。

trans-unit.source: The -d option returns a short description of the table and its keys. Running the option while the table is being updated, and with external locking disabled, may result in an error, but no damage will be done to the table. Each extra v adds more output. -e checks the table thoroughly (but slowly), and the -i options adds statistical information,
trans-unit.target: 该-d选项返回表和它的键的简单描述。在更新表并禁用外部锁定的情况下运行选件可能会导致错误，但不会损坏表。每个额外的v增加更多的输出。-e彻底（但缓慢地）检查表，并且-i选项添加统计信息，

trans-unit.source: The LAG function accesses data from a previous row according to the ORDER BY clause without the need for a self-join. The specific row is determined by the offset (default 1), which specifies the number of rows behind the current row to use. An offset of 0 is the current row.
trans-unit.target: 该LAG函数根据ORDER BY子句，而不需要一个从前一行访问数据自联接。特定行由偏移量确定（默认为1），该偏移量指定要使用的当前行后面的行数。当前行的偏移量为0。

trans-unit.source: The LEAD function accesses data from a following row in the same result set without the need for a self-join. The specific row is determined by the offset (default 1), which specifies the number of rows ahead the current row to use. An offset of 0 is the current row.
trans-unit.target: 该LEAD函数访问来自同一结果集的下一行的数据，而无需自连接。特定行由偏移量确定（默认为1），该偏移量指定要使用的当前行之前的行数。当前行的偏移量为0。

trans-unit.source: The NumBlocksPct configuration parameter specifies the percentage of physical memory to utilize for disk block caching. For a Single Server or Combined Multi Server deployment the default value is 50 to ensure enough physical memory for the UM and for a non combined multi serve deployment the default value is 70.
trans-unit.target: 所述NumBlocksPct配置参数指定的物理内存的百分比利用磁盘块缓存。对于单服务器或联合多服务器部署，默认值为50，以确保UM有足够的物理内存；对于非联合多服务器部署，默认值为70。

trans-unit.source: The TotalUmMemory configuration parameter specifies the percentage of physical memory to utilize for joins, intermediate results and set operations on the UM. This specifies an upper limit for small table results in joins rather than a pre-allocation of memory.
trans-unit.target: 所述TotalUmMemory配置参数指定的物理内存的百分比，以使用用于连接，中间结果和组操作在UM。这为小表导致连接而不是预先分配内存指定了上限。

trans-unit.source: The calDisablePartitions stored procedure allows for disabling of one or more partitions. A disabled partition still exists on the file system (and can be enabled again at a later time) but will not participate in any query, DML or import activity. The procedure takes either two or three mandatory parameters: [database_name], table_name, and partition_numbers separated by commas. If two parameters are provided the current database is assumed. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calDisablePartitions存储过程允许一个或多个分区的禁用。文件系统上仍然存在禁用的分区（以后可以再次启用），但是不会参与任何查询，DML或导入活动。该过程采用两个或三个强制性参数：[ database_name ]，table_name和partition_numbers，以逗号分隔。如果提供了两个参数，则假定为当前数据库。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calDisablePartitionsByValue stored procedure allows for disabling of one or more partitions by value. A disabled partition still exists on the file system (and can be enabled again at a later time) but will not participate in any query, DML or import activity. The procedure takes the same set of arguments as calShowPartitionsByValue. A good practice is to use calShowPartitionsByValue to identify the partitions to be disabled and then the same argument values used to construct the calDisablePartitionsByValue call. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calDisablePartitionsByValue存储过程允许通过值禁用一个或多个分区。文件系统上仍然存在禁用的分区（以后可以再次启用），但是不会参与任何查询，DML或导入活动。该过程采用与calShowPartitionsByValue相同的参数集。一个好的做法是使用calShowPartitionsByValue标识要禁用的分区，然后使用与构造calDisablePartitionsByValue调用相同的参数值。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calDropPartitions stored procedure allows for dropping of one or more partitions. Dropping means that the underlying storage is deleted and the partition is completely removed. A partition can be dropped from either enabled or disabled state. The procedure takes the same set of parameters as calDisablePartitions. Extra caution should be used with this procedure since it is destructive and cannot be reversed. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calDropPartitions存储过程允许一个或多个分区的下降。删除意味着删除了基础存储，并完全删除了分区。可以从启用或禁用状态删除分区。该过程采用与calDisablePartitions相同的参数集。由于此过程具有破坏性且不可逆转，因此应格外小心。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calDropPartitionsByValue stored procedure allows for dropping of one or more partitions by value. Dropping means that the underlying storage is deleted and the partition is completely removed. A partition can be dropped from either enabled or disabled state. The procedure takes the same set of arguments as calShowPartitionsByValue. A good practice is to use calShowPartitionsByValue to identify the partitions to be enabled and then the same argument values used to construct the calDropPartitionsByValue call. Extra caution should be used with this procedure since it is destructive and cannot be reversed. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calDropPartitionsByValue存储过程允许通过值丢弃一个或多个分区。删除意味着删除了基础存储，并完全删除了分区。可以从启用或禁用状态删除分区。该过程采用与calShowPartitionsByValue相同的参数集。一个好的做法是使用calShowPartitionsByValue标识要启用的分区，然后使用与构造calDropPartitionsByValue调用相同的参数值。由于此过程具有破坏性且不可逆转，因此应格外小心。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calEnablePartitions stored procedure allows for enabling of one or more partitions. The procedure takes the same set of parameters as calDisablePartitions. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calEnablePartitions存储过程允许启用一个或多个分区。该过程采用与calDisablePartitions相同的参数集。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calEnablePartitionsbyValue stored procedure allows for enabling of one or more partitions by value. The procedure takes the same set of arguments as calShowPartitionsByValue. A good practice is to use calShowPartitionsByValue to identify the partitions to be enabled and then the same argument values used to construct the calEnablePartitionsbyValue call. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calEnablePartitionsbyValue存储过程允许通过值使得一个或多个分区。该过程采用与calShowPartitionsByValue相同的参数集。一个好的做法是使用calShowPartitionsByValue标识要启用的分区，然后使用与构造calEnablePartitionsbyValue调用相同的参数值。例如：

trans-unit.source: The calGetStats function provides statistics about resources used on the User Module (UM) node, PM node, and network by the last run query. Example:
trans-unit.target: 所述calGetStats功能提供关于所使用的资源的统计信息用户模块（UM）节点，PM节点，网络由最后一次运行查询。例：

trans-unit.source: The cmd takes the following format:
trans-unit.target: 该cmd采用以下格式：

trans-unit.source: The file_name option is the name of the zip file. The entry option is the name of the entry inside the zip file. If there is only one entry file inside the zip file, this option can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 该FILE_NAME选项的zip文件的名称。该条目选择是压缩文件中的条目的名称。如果zip文件中只有一个入口文件，则可以忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: The isam instead of myisam above is not a typo - it's a legacy from when the predecessor to the MyISAM format, called ISAM. The option can be used without specifying a filename, in which case the default, myisam.log is used.
trans-unit.target: 该ISAM代替MyISAM数据上面是不是一个错字-这是从传统的时候前身的MyISAM格式，称为ISAM。可以在不指定文件名的情况下使用该选项，在这种情况下，将使用默认值myisam.log。

trans-unit.source: The length (or precision) specification corresponds to the length of the table field in which the value is stored for text files only. It is used to set the output field length for all table types.
trans-unit.target: 的长度（或精度）规范对应于其中的值被存储为纯文本文件表字段的长度。它用于设置所有表类型的输出字段长度。

trans-unit.source: The length specification corresponds to the length of the table field in which the value is stored for text files only. The scale (was precision) is the number of decimal digits written into text files. For binary table types (BIN and VEC) this does not apply. The length and scale specifications are used to set the output field length and number of decimals for all types of tables.
trans-unit.target: 的长度规范对应于其中的值被存储为纯文本文件表字段的长度。的规模（是精度）是写入文本文件小数位数。对于二进制表类型（BIN和VEC），这不适用。的长度和尺度规格用于设置小数的输出字段长度和数量为所有类型的表。

trans-unit.source: The lock_type can be one of:
trans-unit.target: 该锁类型可以是一个：

trans-unit.source: The resetAlarm command is used to clear and acknowledge the issue is resolved. The resetAlarm command can be invoked with the argument ALL to clear all outstanding local alarms.
trans-unit.target: 该resetAlarm命令用于清除和确认问题得到解决。该resetAlarm命令与参数中的所有调用，以清除所有优秀的本地报警。

trans-unit.source: The return_arg can be one or all:
trans-unit.target: 该return_arg可以是 one 或 all ：

trans-unit.source: The tmp_table_size system variable sets the upper limit for internal MEMORY temporary tables. If an internal temporary table exceeds this size, it is converted automatically into a Aria or MyISAM table on disk with a B-tree index. Notice however, that a MEMORY table cannot be larger than max_heap_table_size.
trans-unit.target: 所述tmp_table_size的系统变量设置为内部存储器的临时表的上限。如果内部临时表超过此大小，它将自动转换为具有B树索引的磁盘上的Aria或MyISAM表。但是请注意，MEMORY表不能大于max_heap_table_size。

trans-unit.source: The Subject Alternative Name (SAN) field, which is an X.509v3 extension, can also be used for server certificate verification, if it is present in the server certificate. This field is also sometimes called subjectAltName. When using a client or utility that supports server certificate verification with subjectAltName fields, if the server certificate contains any subjectAltName fields, then those fields will also be checked against the server's host name and IP address.
trans-unit.target: 的主题备用名称（SAN）领域，这是一个扩展的X.509v3，也可用于服务器证书验证，如果它是存在于服务器证书中。该字段有时也称为subjectAltName。当使用支持带有subjectAltName字段的服务器证书验证的客户端或实用程序时，如果服务器证书包含任何subjectAltName字段，则还将根据服务器的主机名和IP地址检查这些字段。

trans-unit.source: The as type part allows one to specify the value type. In most cases, this is redundant because MariaDB will be able to deduce the type of the value. Explicit type specification may be needed when the type of the value is not apparent. For example, a literal '2012-12-01' has a CHAR type by default, one will need to specify '2012-12-01' AS DATE to have it stored as a date. See Dynamic Columns:Datatypes for further details.
trans-unit.target: 所述 as type 的部分允许指定的值类型。在大多数情况下，这是多余的，因为MariaDB将能够推断出值的类型。当值的类型不明显时，可能需要明确的类型说明。例如，文字 '2012-12-01' 默认情况下具有CHAR类型，需要将 '2012-12-01' AS DATE 指定为“ 2012-12-01” AS DATE才能将其存储为日期。有关更多详细信息，请参见动态列：数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The as type part allows one to specify the value type. In most cases, this is redundant because MariaDB will be able to deduce the type of the value. Explicit type specification may be needed when the type of the value is not apparent. For example, a literal '2012-12-01' has a CHAR type by default, one will need to specify '2012-12-01' AS DATE to have it stored as a date. See the Datatypes section for further details. Note also MDEV-597.
trans-unit.target: 所述 as type 的部分允许指定的值类型。在大多数情况下，这是多余的，因为MariaDB将能够推断出值的类型。当值的类型不明显时，可能需要明确的类型说明。例如，文字 '2012-12-01' 默认情况下具有CHAR类型，则需要指定 '2012-12-01' AS DATE 才能将其存储为日期。有关更多详细信息，请参见“ 数据类型”部分。还请注意MDEV-597。

trans-unit.source: The Aria storage engine was previously known as Maria, (see, the Aria Name). In current releases of MariaDB, you can refer to the engine as Maria or Aria. As this will change in future releases, please update references in your scripts and automation to use the correct name.
trans-unit.target: 该咏叹调存储引擎以前称为玛丽亚，（看到，晓月名称）。在当前的MariaDB版本中，您可以将引擎称为Maria或Aria。由于这将在将来的版本中更改，因此请更新脚本和自动化中的引用以使用正确的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Default field indicates the default value that is assigned to the column.
trans-unit.target: “ 默认”字段指示分配给该列的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The Extra field contains any additional information that is available about a given column.
trans-unit.target: 该附加字段包含可用约给定列的任何其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The Key field indicates whether the column is indexed:
trans-unit.target: 在关键领域指示列是否索引：

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB MaxScale Repository contains software packages related to MariaDB MaxScale.
trans-unit.target: 该MariaDB的MaxScale库包含与软件包MariaDB的MaxScale。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Repository contains software packages related to MariaDB Server, including the server itself, clients and utilities, client libraries, plugins, and Mariabackup.
trans-unit.target: 该MariaDB的存储库包含与MariaDB的服务器软件包，包括服务器本身，客户端及工具，客户端库，插件和Mariabackup。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Tools Repository contains externally developed tools that may be useful with MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 该MariaDB的工具库包含外部开发的工具可能是有用的与MariaDB的。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Tools Repository only contains packages related to Percona XtraBackup. If you are using MariaDB 10.1 or later, then we would also recommend that you look into using Mariabackup instead of Percona XtraBackup, since it is more compatible with MariaDB's features. Mariabackup is in the MariaDB Repository. This means that if you are using MariaDB 10.1 or later, then you probably don't need the MariaDB Tools Repository.
trans-unit.target: 该MariaDB的工具库只包含与Percona的XtraBackup包。如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.1或更高版本，则我们还建议您考虑使用Mariabackup而不是Percona XtraBackup，因为它与MariaDB的功能更加兼容。Mariabackup在MariaDB存储库中。这意味着，如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.1或更高版本，则可能不需要MariaDB工具存储库。

trans-unit.source: The Null field contains YES if NULL values can be stored in the column, NO if not.
trans-unit.target: 在空字段包含YES如果NULL值可以NO如果不被存储在列。

trans-unit.source: The fastest way to insert data into MariaDB is through the LOAD DATA INFILE command.
trans-unit.target: 将数据插入MariaDB 的最快方法是通过 LOAD DATA INFILE 命令。

trans-unit.source: The worker thread has to wait on some request. For example, it might be waiting on disk I/O, or it might be waiting on a lock, or it might just be waiting for a query that called the SLEEP() function to finish.
trans-unit.target: 该工作线程必须等待一些要求。例如，它可能正在磁盘I / O上等待，或者正在等待锁，或者可能正在等待名为 SLEEP() 函数的查询完成。

trans-unit.source: The @a user variable has been lost with the connection, and after the reconnection it is undefined. If it is important to have mysql terminate with an error if the connection has been lost, you can start the mysql client with the --skip-reconnect option.
trans-unit.target: @a用户变量已随连接丢失，并且在重新连接后未定义。如果丢失连接而使mysql终止并出错很重要，则可以使用 --skip-reconnect 选项启动mysql客户端。

trans-unit.source: The ADD clause allows you to add columns to a table. You must specify the data type after the column name.The following statement adds a priority column with an integer datatype to the orders table:
trans-unit.target: ADD子句允许您向表中添加列。必须在列名后指定数据类型,下面的语句为订单表添加了一个优先级列,数据类型为整数。

trans-unit.source: The ALTER TABLE statement modifies existing tables. This includes adding, deleting and renaming columns as well as renaming tables.
trans-unit.target: ALTER TABLE 语句可以修改现有的表,包括增加、删除和重命名列以及重命名表。这包括增加、删除和重命名列以及重命名表。

trans-unit.source: The ALTER USER statement was introduced in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.2.0中引入了ALTER USER语句。

trans-unit.source: The AMI is used for creating a new MariaDB ColumnStore. It will either create the Instances and EBS storages needed during startup, or use ones that you have already created and want to utilize.
trans-unit.target: AMI用于创建一个新的MariaDB ColumnStore。它将在启动过程中创建所需的实例和EBS存储,或者使用那些你已经创建并想利用的实例和EBS存储。

trans-unit.source: The ANSI SQL-standard does not permit double quotes for enclosing strings, and although MariaDB does by default, if the MariaDB server has enabled the ANSI_QUOTES_SQL SQL_MODE, double quotes will be treated as being used for identifiers instead of strings.
trans-unit.target: ANSI SQL标准不允许用双引号引起来的字符串，尽管MariaDB默认情况下允许，但如果MariaDB服务器已启用ANSI_QUOTES_SQL SQL_MODE，则将双引号视为标识符而不是字符串。

trans-unit.source: The API is a part of libmysql C client library. In order to use it, you need to include this header file

trans-unit.source: The API is licensed under LGPLv3.
trans-unit.target: 该API采用LGPLv3授权。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII 26 character (\Z) needs to be escaped when included in a batch file which needs to be executed in Windows. The reason is that ASCII 26, in Windows, is the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: 当包含在需要在Windows中执行的批处理文件中时，需要对ASCII 26字符（ \Z ）进行转义。原因是Windows中的ASCII 26是文件（EOF）的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The AUTO_INCREMENT provides no benefit; in fact it slows down most queries and clutters disk.
trans-unit.target: AUTO_INCREMENT没有提供任何好处,事实上,它降低了大多数查询的速度,并使磁盘变得混乱。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management Plugin supports using multiple encryption keys. Each encryption key can be defined with a different 32-bit integer as a key identifier. If a previously unused identifier is used, then the plugin will automatically generate a new key.
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件支持使用多个加密密钥。可以使用不同的32位整数定义每个加密密钥作为密钥标识符。如果使用了以前未使用的标识符，那么插件将自动生成一个新密钥。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin depends on the AWS SDK for C++, which uses the Apache License, Version 2.0. This license is not compatible with MariaDB Server's GPL 2.0 license, so we are not able to distribute packages that contain the AWS Key Management plugin. Therefore, the only way to currently obtain the plugin is to install it from source.
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件取决于适用于C ++的AWS开发工具包，该工具使用Apache License 2.0版。该许可证与MariaDB Server的GPL 2.0许可证不兼容，因此我们无法分发包含AWS Key Management插件的软件包。因此，当前获取插件的唯一方法是从源代码安装它。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin does support key rotation. To rotate a key, set the aws_key_management_rotate_key system variable. For example, to rotate key with ID 2:
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件确实支持密钥轮换。要旋转键，请设置 aws_key_management_rotate_key 系统变量。例如，要旋转ID为2的钥匙：

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin is a key management and encryption plugin that uses the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Key Management Service (KMS).
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件是使用Amazon Web Services（AWS）密钥管理服务（KMS）的密钥管理和加密插件。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin is a key management and encryption plugin that uses the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Key Management Service (KMS). The AWS Key Management plugin depends on the AWS SDK for C++, which uses the Apache License, Version 2.0. This license is not compatible with MariaDB Server's GPL 2.0 license, so we are not able to distribute packages that contain the AWS Key Management plugin. Therefore, the only way to currently obtain the plugin is to install it from source.
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件是使用Amazon Web Services（AWS）密钥管理服务（KMS）的密钥管理和加密插件。 AWS Key Management插件取决于适用于C ++的AWS开发工具包，该工具使用Apache License 2.0版。该许可证与MariaDB Server的GPL 2.0许可证不兼容，因此我们无法分发包含AWS Key Management插件的软件包。因此，当前获取插件的唯一方法是从源代码安装它。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin uses the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Key Management Service (KMS) to generate and store AES keys on disk, in encrypted form, using the Customer Master Key (CMK) kept in AWS KMS. When MariaDB Server starts, the plugin will decrypt the encrypted keys, using the AWS KMS "Decrypt" API function. MariaDB data will then be encrypted and decrypted using the AES key. It supports multiple encryption keys. It supports key rotation.
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件使用Amazon Web Services（AWS）密钥管理服务（KMS）通过AWS KMS中保存的客户主密钥（CMK）以加密形式在磁盘上生成和存储AES密钥。启动MariaDB Server时，插件将使用AWS KMS“解密” API函数解密加密密钥。然后，将使用AES密钥对MariaDB数据进行加密和解密。它支持多个加密密钥。它支持按键旋转。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Key Management plugin was first added to the MariaDB source code in MariaDB 10.1.13.
trans-unit.target: AWS Key Management插件首先添加到MariaDB 10.1.13中的MariaDB源代码中。

trans-unit.source: The Analyzer has an API that client programs can use to send EXPLAINs. If you are a client application developer, see the EXPLAIN Analyzer API page for details.
trans-unit.target: 分析器具有一个API，客户端程序可以使用该API发送EXPLAIN。如果您是客户端应用程序开发人员，请参阅EXPLAIN Analyzer API页面以获取详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Antelope format can be used to make sure that tables work on MariaDB and MySQL servers which are older than 5.5.
trans-unit.target: Antelope格式可以用来确保表在5.5以上的MariaDB和MySQL服务器上工作。

trans-unit.source: The Apache one uses data sources implemented by the Apache-commons-dbcp2 package and can be used with all drivers including those not implementing data sources. However, the Apache package must be installed and its three required jar files accessible via the class path.
trans-unit.target: Apache的使用Apache-commons-dbcp2包实现的数据源,可以用于所有的驱动,包括那些没有实现数据源的驱动。但是,必须安装Apache包,并通过类路径访问它所需的三个jar文件。

trans-unit.source: The Aria Name
trans-unit.target: 咏叹调的名字

trans-unit.source: The Aria log is not encrypted (MDEV-8587). This affects only non-temporary Aria tables though.
trans-unit.target: Aria日志未加密（MDEV-8587）。但是，这仅影响非临时Aria表。

trans-unit.source: The Aria storage engine is compiled-in by default and is considered as an upgrade to MyISAM.
trans-unit.target: Aria存储引擎是默认编译的,被认为是MyISAM的升级。

trans-unit.source: The Aria table must be non transactional and have ROW_FORMAT=PAGE.
trans-unit.target: Aria表必须是非事务性的，并且具有ROW_FORMAT = PAGE。

trans-unit.source: The Audit Plugin will log the database activities of all users, or only the users that you specify. A database activity is defined as a query event or a table event. Connect events are logged for all users.
trans-unit.target: 审核插件将记录所有用户或仅指定用户的数据库活动。数据库活动定义为查询事件或表事件。将为所有用户记录连接事件。

trans-unit.source: The BACKUP LOCK command was introduced in MariaDB 10.4.2.
trans-unit.target: BACKUP LOCK命令在MariaDB 10.4.2中引入。

trans-unit.source: The BENCHMARK() function executes the expression expr repeatedly count times. It may be used to time how quickly MariaDB processes the expression. The result value is always 0. The intended use is from within the mysql client, which reports query execution times.
trans-unit.target: BENCHMARK（）函数重复 count 表达式 expr 的次数。它可以用于计时MariaDB处理表达式的速度。结果值始终为0。预期用途是从mysql客户端内部使用的，该客户端报告查询执行时间。

trans-unit.source: The BINLOG statement of type `%s` was not preceded by a format description BINLOG statement.
trans-unit.target: 类型为"%s "的BINLOG语句之前没有格式描述BINLOG语句。

trans-unit.source: The BINLOG_GTID_POS() function takes as input an old-style binary log position in the form of a file name and a file offset. It looks up the position in the current binlog, and returns a string representation of the corresponding GTID position. If the position is not found in the current binlog, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: BINLOG_GTID_POS（）函数采用文件名和文件偏移量形式的旧式二进制日志位置作为输入。它在当前binlog中查找位置，并返回相应GTID位置的字符串表示形式。如果在当前binlog中找不到该位置，则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: The BUILD dir contains various scripts for compiling MariaDB on Solaris. The BUILD/compile-solaris-amd64 and BUILD/compile-solaris-amd64-debug are probably the most useful.
trans-unit.target: BUILD目录包含用于在Solaris上编译MariaDB的各种脚本。在 BUILD/compile-solaris-amd64 和 BUILD/compile-solaris-amd64-debug 可能是最有用的。

trans-unit.source: The Backup and Restore is part of the MariaDB ColumnStore Tools package. It can be downloaded from:
trans-unit.target: 备份和还原是MariaDB ColumnStore工具包的一部分。它可以从以下地方下载:

trans-unit.source: The Basics
trans-unit.target: 基础知识

trans-unit.source: The Boolean Nodir option can be set to false (0 or no) to add directories that match the file name pattern from the listed files (it is true by default). This is an addition to CONNECT version 1.6. Previously, directory names matching pattern were listed on Windows. Directories were and are never listed on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 布尔运算Nodir选项可以设置为false(0或no),以从列出的文件中添加符合文件名模式的目录(默认为true)。这是CONNECT 1.6版新增的功能。以前,与模式相匹配的目录名在Windows上被列出。在Linux上,目录是而且从未被列出。

trans-unit.source: The C API functions mysql_options() and mysql_optionsv() are used for passing connection attributes to the server.
trans-unit.target: C API函数mysql_options（）和mysql_optionsv（）用于将连接属性传递到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The C++ development part needed to build programs
trans-unit.target: 构建程序所需的C++开发部分

trans-unit.source: The CHANGE clause allows you to rename a column in a table or change a column to an autoincrement column.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE子句允许你重命名表中的一列或将一列改为自动增量列。

trans-unit.source: The COLUMN_CHECK function was added in MariaDB 10.0.1.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.1中添加了COLUMN_CHECK函数。

trans-unit.source: The COMMIT statement makes changes to a table permanent. You should only commit changes after you have verified the integrity of the changed data. Once data is committed, it cannot be undone with the ROLLBACK statement. To return the database to its former state, you must restore the data from backups.
trans-unit.target: COMMIT语句使对表的更改永久化。只有在验证了更改数据的完整性之后,才可以提交更改。数据一旦提交,就不能用ROLLBACK语句撤销。要将数据库恢复到以前的状态,必须从备份中恢复数据。

trans-unit.source: The COMMIT usually succeeds, but could fail if some other node is messing with the same rows. (Galera retries on autocommit failures.)
trans-unit.target: COMMIT通常会成功,但如果有其他节点在处理相同的行,则可能会失败。(Galera会在自动提交失败时重试。)

trans-unit.source: The COMPACT row format is similar to the REDUNDANT row format, but it store...
trans-unit.target: COMPACT行格式与REDUNDANT行格式类似,但它存储的是一个新的数据。

trans-unit.source: The COMPRESSED row format is similar to the COMPACT row format, but tables ...
trans-unit.target: COMPRESSED行格式与COMPACT行格式类似,但表 ...

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT MYSQL table type being used anyway, you’d rather use it to directly access the remote tables. Indeed, the partition names can also be used to modify the connection URL’s. For instance, in the case shown above, the partition table can be created as:
trans-unit.target: 无论如何都使用CONNECT MYSQL表类型，您宁愿使用它直接访问远程表。实际上，分区名称也可以用于修改连接URL。例如，在上面显示的情况下，分区表可以创建为：

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT MYSQL table type should not be regarded as a replacement for the FEDERATED(X) engine. The main use of the MYSQL type is to access other engine tables as if they were CONNECT tables. This was necessary when accessing tables from some CONNECT table types such as TBL, XCOL, OCCUR, or PIVOT that are designed to access CONNECT tables only. When their target table is not a CONNECT table, these types are silently using internally an intermediate MYSQL table.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT MYSQL表类型不应视为FEDERATED（X）引擎的替代。MYSQL类型的主要用途是访问其他引擎表，就像它们是CONNECT表一样。当从某些CONNECT表类型（例如TBL，XCOL，OCCUR或PIVOT）访问表时，这是必需的，这些类型仅用于访问CONNECT表。当它们的目标表不是CONNECT表时，这些类型将在内部使用中间MYSQL表进行静默处理。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT MYSQL type supports SELECT and INSERT and a somewhat limited form of UPDATE and DELETE. These are described below.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT MYSQL类型支持SELECT和INSERT以及UPDATE和DELETE的某种有限形式。这些在下面描述。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT WMI table type enables administrators and operators not capable of scripting or programming on top of WMI to enjoy the benefit of WMI without even learning about it. It permits to present this information as tables that can be queried, transformed, copied in documents or other tables.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT WMI表类型使管理员和操作者不能够在WMI之上编写脚本或编程,甚至不需要学习就能享受WMI的好处。它允许将这些信息以表格的形式呈现,可以查询、转换、复制到文档或其他表格中。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT engine adds this facility to MariaDB by supporting tables based on JSON data files. This is done like for XML tables by creating tables describing what should be retrieved from the file and how it should be processed.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT引擎通过支持基于JSON数据文件的表,为MariaDB增加了这一设施。这就像XML表一样,通过创建描述应该从文件中检索什么以及如何处理的表来完成。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT engine was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT引擎是在MariaDB 10.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT handler was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT处理程序是在MariaDB 10.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT implementation of the PIVOT table type does much of the work required to transform the source table:
trans-unit.target: PIVOT表类型的CONNECT实现完成了转换源表所需的大部分工作。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT storage engine allows you to create tables that refer to tables on an external server, and it can fetch the data using a compatible JDBC driver. PostgreSQL does have a freely available JDBC driver. If you install this JDBC driver on the MariaDB server, then the MariaDB server will be able to connect to the remote PostgreSQL server via JDBC. At that point, you can create tables with the ENGINE=CONNECT and table_type=JDBC table options set, so that you can access the PostgreSQL tables from MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT存储引擎使您可以创建引用外部服务器上表的表，并且可以使用兼容的JDBC驱动程序来获取数据。PostgreSQL确实有一个免费的JDBC驱动程序。如果您在MariaDB服务器上安装此JDBC驱动程序，则MariaDB服务器将能够通过JDBC连接到远程PostgreSQL服务器。此时，您可以创建带有 ENGINE=CONNECT 和 table_type=JDBC 表选项的表，以便可以从MariaDB访问PostgreSQL表。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT storage engine allows you to create tables that refer to tables on an external server, and it can fetch the data using a compatible ODBC driver. PostgreSQL does have a freely available ODBC driver called psqlODBC. Therefore, if you install psqlODBC on the MariaDB Server, and then configure the system's ODBC framework (such as unixODBC), then the MariaDB server will be able to connect to the remote PostgreSQL server. At that point, you can create tables with the ENGINE=CONNECT and table_type=ODBC table options set, so that you can access the PostgreSQL tables from MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT存储引擎使您可以创建引用外部服务器上表的表，并且可以使用兼容的ODBC驱动程序来获取数据。PostgreSQL确实有一个免费的ODBC驱动程序，称为 psqlODBC 。因此，如果在MariaDB服务器上安装 psqlODBC ，然后配置系统的ODBC框架（例如unixODBC），则MariaDB服务器将能够连接到远程PostgreSQL服务器。到那时，您可以创建带有 ENGINE=CONNECT 和 table_type=ODBC 表选项的表，以便可以从MariaDB访问PostgreSQL表。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT storage engine enables MariaDB to access external local or remote data (MED). This is done by defining tables based on different data types, in particular files in various formats, data extracted from other DBMS or products (such as Excel or MongoDB) via ODBC or JDBC, or data retrieved from the environment (for example DIR, WMI, and MAC tables)
trans-unit.target: CONNECT存储引擎使MariaDB能够访问外部本地或远程数据(MED)。这是通过定义基于不同数据类型的表来实现的,特别是各种格式的文件,通过ODBC或JDBC从其他DBMS或产品(如Excel或MongoDB)中提取的数据,或从环境中检索的数据(如DIR、WMI和MAC表)。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT storage engine enables MariaDB to access external local or remote data.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT存储引擎使MariaDB能够访问外部本地或远程数据。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECT storage engine was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT存储引擎是在MariaDB 10.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The CONNECTION option is the URL used to establish the connection with the remote server. Its syntax depends on the external DBMS and in this example is the one used to connect as root to a MySQL or MariaDB local database using the MySQL JDBC connector.
trans-unit.target: CONNECTION选项是用于与远程服务器建立连接的URL。它的语法取决于外部的DBMS,在本例中,它是用来作为root使用MySQL JDBC连接器连接到MySQL或MariaDB本地数据库的。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB不支持CREATE LOGFILE GROUP语句。它的起源是...

trans-unit.target: 可以使用SHOW CREATE SEQUENCE STATEMENT查看CREATE SEQUENCE语句以及默认值，例如：

trans-unit.source: The CREATE SERVER statement creates an entry in the mysql.servers table that can later be used with the CREATE TABLE statement when creating a Spider, FederatedX or FEDERATED table. The options that you specify will be used to populate the columns in the mysql.servers table. The table columns are Server_name, Host, Db, Username, Password, Port and Socket.
trans-unit.target: CREATE SERVER语句在mysql.servers表中创建一个条目，以后可在创建Spider，FederatedX或FEDERATED表时与CREATE TABLE语句一起使用。您指定的选项将用于填充mysql.servers表中的列。表列是服务器名，主机，Db，用户名，密码，端口和套接字。

trans-unit.source: The CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE method of enabling and disabling the InnoDB Lock Monitor has been deprecated, and may be removed in a future version of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 启用和禁用InnoDB Lock Monitor的CREATE TABLE和DROP TABLE方法已经被废弃,可能会在未来的MariaDB版本中被移除。

trans-unit.source: The CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE method of enabling and disabling the InnoDB Monitor has been deprecated, and may be removed in a future version of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 启用和禁用InnoDB Monitor的CREATE TABLE和DROP TABLE方法已经被废弃,可能会在MariaDB的未来版本中被移除。

trans-unit.source: The CREATE VIEW statement creates a new view, or replaces an existing one if the OR REPLACE clause is given. If the view does not exist, CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW is the same as CREATE VIEW. If the view does exist, CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW is the same as ALTER VIEW.
trans-unit.target: CREATE VIEW语句创建一个新视图，或者如果给出OR REPLACE子句，则替换现有视图。如果该视图不存在，则CREATE或REPLACE VIEW与CREATE VIEW相同。如果该视图确实存在，则CREATE或REPLACE VIEW与ALTER VIEW相同。

trans-unit.source: The CREATE VIEW statement requires the CREATE VIEW privilege for the view, and some privilege for each column selected by the SELECT statement. For columns used elsewhere in the SELECT statement you must have the SELECT privilege. If the OR REPLACE clause is present, you must also have the DROP privilege for the view.
trans-unit.target: CREATE VIEW语句要求视图有CREATE VIEW权限,SELECT语句选择的每一列都要有一定的权限。对于SELECT语句中其他地方使用的列,必须拥有SELECT权限。如果存在OR REPLACE子句,还必须拥有视图的DROP权限。

trans-unit.source: The CSV Storage Engine can read and append to files stored in CSV (comma-separated-values) format.
trans-unit.target: CSV存储引擎可以读取和追加以CSV(逗号分隔值)格式存储的文件。

trans-unit.source: The CSV storage engine
trans-unit.target: CSV存储引擎

trans-unit.source: The CSV storage engine and logging to tables
trans-unit.target: CSV存储引擎和对表格的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: The CSV storage engine is the default storage engine when using logging of SQL queries to tables.
trans-unit.target: 使用SQL查询记录到表时，CSV存储引擎是默认存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: The CUME_DIST() function was first introduced with window functions in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: CUME_DIST（）函数是在MariaDB 10.2.0中与窗口函数一起首次引入的。

trans-unit.source: The CURRENT keywords adds nothing to the statement, because MariaDB has only one diagnostics area.
trans-unit.target: CURRENT关键字并没有给语句增加任何内容,因为MariaDB只有一个诊断区域。

trans-unit.source: The Cassandra Query Language (CQL) is the best way to work with Cassandra. It resembles SQL on first glance, however the resemblance is very shallow. CQL queries are tightly bound to the way Cassandra accesses its data internally. For example, you can't have even the smallest join. In fact, adding a mere ... AND non_indexed_column=1 into a WHERE clause is already invalid CQL.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra查询语言（CQL）是使用Cassandra的最佳方法。乍一看，它类似于SQL，但是相似之处很浅。CQL查询与Cassandra内部访问其数据的方式紧密相关。例如，您甚至不能拥有最小的联接。实际上，仅将 ... AND non_indexed_column=1 到 WHERE 子句中已经是无效的CQL。

trans-unit.source: The Cassandra Storage Engine allows access to data in a Cassandra cluster from MariaDB. The overall architecture is shown in the picture below and is similar to that of the NDB cluster storage engine.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra存储引擎可以从MariaDB访问Cassandra集群中的数据。整体架构如下图所示,与NDB集群存储引擎类似。

trans-unit.source: The Cassandra storage engine is included but is not installed/activated by default.
trans-unit.target: 包括Cassandra存储引擎,但默认情况下没有安装/激活。

trans-unit.source: The Cassandra storage engine is not included in any regular MariaDB 5.5 release.
trans-unit.target: Cassandra存储引擎未包含在任何常规的MariaDB 5.5版本中。

trans-unit.source: The Certificate Authority (CA) is typically an organization (such as Let's Encrypt) that signs the X509 certificate and validates ownership of the domain. However, when you would like to use self-signed certificates, you need to create the private key and certificate for the CA yourself, and then you can use them to sign your own X509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 证书颁发机构（CA）通常是签署X509证书并验证域所有权的组织（如Let's Encrypt）。但是，当您想使用自签名证书时，需要自己为CA创建私钥和证书，然后可以使用它们来签名自己的X509证书。

trans-unit.target: 变化缓冲区是一种优化,因为。

trans-unit.target: ColumnStore Bulk Data API可以创建性能更高的应用程序。

trans-unit.target: ColumnStore分布式UDF API。这可以通过使用函数来分布式执行where子句和group,并将尽可能推送到PM节点上执行。

trans-unit.target: 单点的ConvexHull就是简单的单点。

trans-unit.source: The DATA_CHARSET option must be used to specify the character set used in the data source or file. Note that, unlike usually with MariaDB, when a multi-byte character set is used, the column size represents the number of bytes the column value can contain, not the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用DATA_CHARSET选项来指定数据源或文件中使用的字符集。请注意,与通常使用MariaDB不同的是,当使用多字节字符集时,列的大小代表列值可以包含的字节数,而不是字符数。

trans-unit.source: The DBRoot number for the extent
trans-unit.target: 范围的DBRoot号

trans-unit.source: The DBRoot where the physical row resides
trans-unit.target: 物理行所在的DBRoot。

trans-unit.source: The DDL syntax is different. While binaries from Tokutek have the patched SQL parser, TokuDB in MariaDB uses the special Storage Engine API extension. Thus in Tokutek binaries you write CLUSTERED KEY (columns) and, for example, ROW_FORMAT=TOKUDB_LZMA. And in MariaDB you write KEY (columns) CLUSTERING=YES and COMPRESSION=TOKUDB_LZMA.
trans-unit.target: DDL语法不同。尽管来自Tokutek的二进制文件具有修补的SQL解析器，但MariaDB中的TokuDB使用特殊的Storage Engine API扩展。因此，在Tokutek二进制文件中，您将编写 CLUSTERED KEY (columns) ，例如， ROW_FORMAT=TOKUDB_LZMA 。在MariaDB中，您编写 KEY (columns) CLUSTERING=YES COMPRESSION=TOKUDB_LZMA = YES和COMPRESSION = TOKUDB_LZMA。

trans-unit.source: The DECIMAL data type corresponds to what MariaDB or ODBC data sources call NUMBER, NUMERIC, or DECIMAL: a numeric value with a maximum number of digits (the precision) some of them eventually being decimal digits (the scale). The internal coding in CONNECT is a character representation of the number. For instance:
trans-unit.target: DECIMAL数据类型对应于MariaDB或ODBC数据源称为NUMBER，NUMERIC或DECIMAL的数字：具有最大位数（精度）的数字值，其中某些数字最终为十进制数字（小数位数）。CONNECT中的内部编码是数字的字符表示。例如：

trans-unit.source: The DEFINER and SQL SECURITY clauses determine which MariaDB account to use when checking access privileges for the view when a statement is executed that references the view. They were added in MySQL 5.1.2. The legal SQL SECURITY characteristic values are DEFINER and INVOKER. These indicate that the required privileges must be held by the user who defined or invoked the view, respectively. The default SQL SECURITY value is DEFINER.
trans-unit.target: 当执行引用视图的语句时,DEFINER和SQL SECURITY子句决定在检查视图的访问权限时使用哪个MariaDB账户。它们是在MySQL 5.1.2中添加的。合法的SQL SECURITY特性值是DEFINER和INVOKER。这些表示所需的权限必须分别由定义或调用视图的用户持有。默认的SQL SECURITY值是DEFINER。

trans-unit.source: The DEFINER and SQL SECURITY clauses for views are extensions to standard SQL. In standard SQL, views are handled using the rules for SQL SECURITY INVOKER.
trans-unit.target: 视图的DEFINER和SQL SECURITY子句是对标准SQL的扩展。在标准SQL中,视图使用SQL SECURITY INVOKER的规则来处理。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE privilege for the mysql database is required to run DROP FUNCTION as the corresponding record will be removed from the mysql.func-table.
trans-unit.target: 运行DROP FUNCTION需要mysql数据库的DELETE特权，因为将从mysql.func-table中删除相应的记录。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE statement is used to remove rows from tables.
trans-unit.target: DELETE语句用于从表中删除行。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE with WHERE clause will do per-row deletions.
trans-unit.target: 带WHERE子句的DELETE将按行进行删除。

trans-unit.source: The DENSE_RANK() function was first introduced with window functions in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: DENSE_RANK（）函数首先在MariaDB 10.2.0中与窗口函数一起引入。

trans-unit.source: The DOUBLE data type corresponds to the C language double type, a floating-point double precision value coded with 8 bytes. Like for integers, the internal coding in tables depends on the table type, characters for text files, and platform binary representation for binary files.
trans-unit.target: DOUBLE数据类型对应于C语言double类型，这是一个用8个字节编码的浮点双精度值。像整数一样，表中的内部编码取决于表类型，文本文件的字符以及二进制文件的平台二进制表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The DROP + CREATE might be faster than TRUNCATE, which is the desired effect.
trans-unit.target: DROP+CREATE可能比TRUNCATE更快,这就是想要的效果。

trans-unit.source: The DROP FUNCTION statement is used to drop a stored function or a user-defined function (UDF). That is, the specified routine is removed from the server, along with all privileges specific to the function. You must have the ALTER ROUTINEprivilege for the routine in order to drop it. If the automatic_sp_privileges server system variable is set, both the ALTER ROUTINE and EXECUTE privileges are granted automatically to the routine creator - see Stored Routine Privileges.
trans-unit.target: DROP FUNCTION语句用于删除存储的函数或用户定义的函数（UDF）。也就是说，指定的例程以及该功能的所有特权都将从服务器中删除。您必须对该例程具有 ALTER ROUTINE 特权才能删除它。如果设置了automatic_sp_privileges服务器系统变量，则将 ALTER ROUTINE 和 EXECUTE 特权自动授予例程创建者-请参见存储的例程特权。

trans-unit.target: DROP PROCEDURE语句从ColumnStore中删除一个存储过程。

trans-unit.source: The EXAMPLE storage engine was designed as a stub with no functionality primarily to assist developers with the source code for writing new MySQL storage engines.
trans-unit.target: EXAMPLE存储引擎是作为一个没有功能的存根设计的,主要是为了帮助开发人员编写新的MySQL存储引擎的源代码。

trans-unit.source: The EXECSRC option tells that this table will be used to send a command to the data source. Most of the sent commands do not return result set. Therefore, the table columns are used to specify the command to be executed and to get the result of the execution. The name of these columns can be chosen arbitrarily, their function coming from the FLAG value:
trans-unit.target: EXECSRC选项告诉我们,这个表将被用来向数据源发送命令。大多数发送的命令不返回结果集。因此,表中的列是用来指定要执行的命令和获取执行结果的。这些列的名称可以任意选择,其功能来自于FLAG值。

trans-unit.source: The EXECSRC option tells that this table will be used to send commands to the MariaDB server. Most of the sent commands do not return result set. Therefore, the table columns are used to specify the command to be executed and to get the result of the execution. The name of these columns can be chosen arbitrarily, their function coming from the FLAG value:
trans-unit.target: EXECSRC选项告诉我们,这个表将被用来向MariaDB服务器发送命令。大多数发送的命令都不会返回结果集,因此,表列是用来指定要执行的命令,并获取执行结果。因此,表中的列是用来指定要执行的命令和获取执行结果的。这些列的名称可以任意选择,其功能来自于FLAG值。

trans-unit.source: The Eperi Key Management Plugin supports using multiple encryption keys. Each encryption key can be defined with a different 32-bit integer as a key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Eperi密钥管理插件支持使用多个加密密钥。可以使用不同的32位整数定义每个加密密钥作为密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The Eperi Key Management plugin is a key management and encryption plugin that integrates with eperi Gateway for Databases.
trans-unit.target: Eperi密钥管理插件是与eperi Gateway for Databases集成的密钥管理和加密插件。

trans-unit.source: The Eperi Key Management plugin is a key management and encryption plugin that uses the eperi Gateway for Databases. The eperi Gateway for Databases stores encryption keys on the key server outside of the database server itself, which provides an extra level of security. The eperi Gateway for Databases also supports performing all data encryption operations on the key server as well, but this is optional.
trans-unit.target: Eperi密钥管理插件是使用eperi Gateway for Databases的密钥管理和加密插件。该eperi网关数据库的数据库服务器本身，它提供了额外的安全水平的关键服务器外部存储加密密钥。该eperi网关数据库还支持关键服务器上执行的所有数据加密操作为好，但这是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The Eperi Key Management plugin is one of the key management and encryption plugins that can be set up for users who want to use data-at-rest encryption. Some of the plugin's primary features are:

trans-unit.source: The Eperi Key Management plugin supports key rotation.
trans-unit.target: Eperi密钥管理插件支持密钥旋转。
